reviews: Feel durable, sound great and fits comfortable around the ears.
They’re very nice. Long charge, and very comfortable. My grandson loves them and so do I
My son loves them

I ordered these for my son to use with his Nintendo Switch. I like them, they seem to be good quality and they are comfortable, but it has one flaw that isn't mentioned on the site. The microphone only works with bluetooth. In fact, the wire that comes with it is only for audio, not microphone. The Switch on the other hand only works with microphone in wired mode, and not bluetooth. So I had to send them back. If you can use bluetooth, I would recommend these, but if you need microphone through the wire, I'm afraid they won't work.

I got these for my son for school and to be honest it’s one of the nicest headsets I have ever bought it’s very versatile to meet your needs and many settings for the lights on the side he loves them. I will be buying more for my other kiddos.
good for kids
I bought these for my 7 year old and he likes them a-lot. Easy to use and durable enough to withstand a 7 year old boy.
Just like others said, it worked for about 2 months now won’t turn on. The light shows it’s charging but it will not turn on. Do not buy

item12.name: Wireless Earbud, 2023 Sport Wireless Bluetooth 5.3 Earbud with HiFi Stereo, 75H Over Ear Bud with Noise Cancelling Mic, IP7 Waterproof Bluetooth Headphones, LED Display, Button Control, Blue, for Gym
item12.description:
Designed for Sport and IP7 Waterproof: 2023 Blue sport wireless bluetooth earbud with soft, flexible, and secure-fit earhooks gently to the contours of your ears without falling out even for workout, and the ergonomic design ensure your headphones stay comfortably firm in place when running, hiking, jogging, and other activity. Wireless sport earbud are rating at IP7 waterproof level, with waterproof and sweat proof, you can use it in any weather without worrying about damaging the headset.
Bluetooth 5.3 and One Step Auto Connect: Wireless earbud adopt bluetooth 5.3 chip technology you can get 2X fast transfer speed (75% higher than the previous generation), more stable transmission, lower power consumption and ultra-low latency listening experience. Pick up the bluetooth headphones from the charging case, select "BX29" on your bluetooth device to pair your earphones in just one step, and the paired device will automatically connect the next time you use it.
Superior Sound Quality and Clear Call: Wireless headphones have strong 14.2mm speakers driving units and in ear acoustic structure support, which produces a strong bass, clear mid sound, and bright treble. Noise cancelling earbud feature noise-canceling calls, effectively reducing background noise, creating a stable and clearer calling environment like you are communicating face to face with others.
75H Playtime and LED Digital Display: BX29 upgraded bluetooth earbud with a longer battery charging case, it has 10 hrs more playtime than last generation. Up to 75 hrs of total listening time in turn, one earbud can be used for 15 hours on one charge, the case can provide extra 4 times the full charge for earbud. The LED display on over ear earbud accurately display the remaining power of earbud and charging case, the powerful battery allow for all day listening.
Button Control and Wide Compatibility: The multi-function button on earphones in ear can manage audio play or calls effortlessly. You can switch songs, increase and decrease volume, activate voice assistant, answer/reject calls simply by pressing button, but don't need to adjust the music by your device. Wireless earbud for android compatible with most devices including iOS or Android smartphones, computer, Laptop, etc.
reviews: Best headphones I've ever had, great range, and amazing sound with a really good bass boost compared to other earbuds. Great for tough gym sessions, noise cancelation is amazing, and it paired easily with my iPhone. Very comfortable and fits perfectly around the ear. Also, very long battery life compared to other ear buds I have purchased.

I am someone who likes products that are good enough and don't understand how others are willing to pay $200 for a pair of headphones. I am also someone who doesn't want a junk product, just good enough quality at a good enough price. I bought these wireless earphones because I accidentally lost mine. Considering these earphones don't have the trusted brand of a name like Sony or Apple, it's always a bit of a gamble to buy a product that doesn't carry the peace of mind of a well-known big brand name, but it also doesn't carry the high price tag of one of those brands. I am writing this review because I am pleasantly surprised with the overall quality of these earphones. Both the sound quality and the build quality meet or exceed my expectations. The price makes it a great value find. The shape is comfortable for a 1-hour walk, no issues. Battery life seems normal to above normal. I've only had them for a few days but already find them to be better than my previous headphones that I lost. If they were to break or stop working prematurely, I will update this review. But if you're reading this now, that means they are still good.

I have owned more than a dozen types of earbuds including two pairs of Apples. Being a woman, I have smaller ears and I’ve always had difficulty keeping them in my ears when on exercise equipment. These earbuds are so comfortable and stay put, give me amazing quality of sound, awesome noise canceling and the charge seems to last forever. They seem to connect instantly with my device unlike others that I’ve always had to pair up with every use. I’m thrilled, they will be the only ones I ever buy again! Best of all the price can’t be beat.

Sound quality is surprisingly good for the price. Plenty enough bass, but not too much where it takes over. Mids and highs have a good balance. The volume is plenty loud enough to use in noisy environments.
But my favorite features are definitely the ear hooks and having physical buttons for the controls.
These things stay put far better than the normal style earbuds when doing any kind of physical activity or even eating. And on the infrequent occasion when you do have to readjust these on your ears, you're not constantly accidentally pushing the oversensitive touch controls that most regular earbuds have these days. Starting to get tired of that.
Battery life is definitely awesome. Lasts a super long time. Far longer than any of my other sets of regular earbuds. I've had these for going on a month now and I'm just charging the case for the first time. Pretty amazing.
So yeah, these are definitely worth the price. Hopefully they'll last a while.

One thing I personally don't like about these nowadays is that there's no ear hook. These are so comfortable and you never have to worry about them falling off! I recommend these for great sound quality, comfortability, and compatibility for androids. Excellent product! The battery lasts absolutely forever so don't worry about that either!

I purchased these earbuds because I lost the charging case for a much more expensive set of earbuds and resolved not to throw good money after bad in search of audiophile quality.

Pros: the fit of these earbuds is astoundingly good and the over-the-ear hooks are comfortable and better than my high priced buds. These two features alone make this a good purchase. I can comfortably work while wearing them without fear that they will dislodge, and the noise isolation is very good. The sound quality for podcasts is very good. Despite some other negative reviews about the controls, I actually like the physical controls on these buds and find them convenient to use, because I can feel the buttons on the earbuds. I don't know how the battery will hold up, but in the short time that I have owned them the batteries in both the buds and the base have held a good charge.

Cons: Read the advertisement carefully: these earbuds do not have active noise-cancelling playback. I blame myself for not reading the advertisement better, and I do like the noise isolation that these earbuds provide, but I could not rate them highly as a "noise cancelling" device, at least for playback. The sound quality for music playback is acceptable, given the price point, but the bass gets a muddy fast and there's detectable distortion at higher (but otherwise safe) volume.

Bottom line: a solid 4 stars and solid value for my purposes.

LOVE THESE BUDS.. my husband is ill so I have buds in from the time I get up till the time i go to bed.. the battery last all day and then I charge them before bed... the FIT IS AWSOME.. they are not stiff.. very flexible..the sound is great.. compared to the last pair I had I actually had to turn volume down because these buds didn't need to be up that far for good sound...
the price was surprising for how these buds perform!! awesome!!

I bought these earbuds to use while traveling and found them to be a very good value and easy to use. Well, not supposed to be sound blocking, I did find them very helpful in blocking noise while flying. I like the feature on the case that shows you the battery life. I recommend them highly.

Très bien ! Le son est pas incroyable mais bon , on peut pas s'attendre à mieux à ce prix.
Très bon maintient .
Petit bémol pour la boîte qui est super glissante Oo
Lo mejores auriculares Bluetooth aparte de el sonido genial y muy fuerte batería dura mucho , son cómodas y no hay problemas de emparejar como en otras ni si vais a sacar una por una

Ich habe die BX29 als Ersatz für meine verschwundenen JBL Wave 100 Buds gekauft. Ich nutze die Kopfhörer hauptsächlich für Hörbücher und zum Telefonieren und für diesen Zweck sind Sie auf jeden Fall top geeignet. Im Vergleich zu den JBL ist die Sprache natürlicher und für mich dadurch besser zu verstehen. Bei Music ist der Bass wenn man die passende Größe Stöpsel verwendet sehr gut, ich verwende jedoch eine Nummer kleiner um besser die Umwelt um mich herum beim Laufen hören zu können, mit den kleineren Stöpseln finde ich die Earbuds auch angenehmer zu tragen. Die JBL (Model ohne Bügel) mußte ich immer ganz fest ins Ohr drücken damit sie hielten, die BX29 sitzen dank dem Bügel auch ohne Druck sehr angenehm und fallen auch nicht heraus. Wobei die Bügel auch nicht wie bei anderen Bluetooth Headsets die ich schon hatte mit der Brille um den korrekten Sitz konkurieren. Ich hatte zwischendurch "günstige" in-ears beim Discounter gekauft, diese waren jedoch für mich praktisch nicht zu gebrauchen.
Positiv ist mir außerdem das automatische pairing bei der Entnahme aus der Ladeschale aufgefallen, welches zu den am besten funktionierenden gehört die ich bisher benutzt habe, meine großen Over-Ear ANC Kopfhören könnten sich da eine Scheibe von abschneiden.
Appropos Noise Canceling: die BX29 haben nur ENC, kein ANC, wer wirklich auf das Noise Canceling angewiesen ist sollte lieber in große Over-Ear Kopfhörer mit guten ANC investieren.
Ich hatte die BX29 extra als ein günstigeres In-Ear Model ausgesucht für dne Fall das diese auch verlohren gehen, würde diese aber auch ansonsten als in-ears jetzt wieder kaufen. Die JBL hatten das doppelte gekostet, eine schlechtere Sprachverständlichkeit und wesentlich schlechtere Reichweite in der Wohnung.
Je nach Anwendung habe ich auch noch mehrere andere Kopfhörer im Einsatz, aber als kleine, günstige, portable in-ears sind die BX29 wirklich zu empfehlen.

I have had wireless ear buds before, and normally I lose them (they fall out) before they break. These have a useful over-the-ear hook that is very comfortable and ensures they don't fall out. I have health issues that means I can fall over when my legs give way. I use crutches, but when I fall, my main concern is trying not to get hurt, so concern for my ear buds is far from my mind. So far, I have fallen over a number of times while using these ear buds and not once have they fallen off my ears. I would imagine they would be great for runners or for use during gym workouts for the same reason - they don't fall out.

The battery life has not caused me any concerns. I tend to use them for between 2 to 6 hours at most though. Each time I stop using them they go back in their charging case. I charge the case every few days - not because it is out of power, but just to keep it topped up.

Sound quality for me is perfectly fine. I tend to listen to BBC Sounds or to Audible audiobooks. I am not an audiophile - these are more than good enough for me.

Using for making phone calls - I have had no real complaints from people on the other end of a call. I have often used them to make calls from a car or when outside, even in windy weather. Although once when I was out in extremely windy and wet weather the other person did say they had trouble hearing me - which is understandable.

The control buttons, as with all such ear buds, do take a little getting used to as not all devices use the same sequence of short or long taps to do the same things. However, they do work pretty well. The basics or volume up / down and pause/play work great - I tend to do other things on the phone rather than try to remember the exact button press method for more complicated functions.

The best feature to me at least - and remember, I'm not an audiophile - is that you can wear both buds, but turn one off. This means you can double the length of time you can use the earbuds between recharging - as long as you only use one at a time. It also allows you to have one ear free to listen to your surroundings / other people. For listening to audiobooks or music while out and about this works well for me. When one goes flat (only happened once on a long day out), you simply turn the other bud on, and carry on. It means I don't need to carry the charging case with me on a day trip.

I've only had them for a few weeks, so I can't comment on how long they will last - only time will tell. As long as they last more than 12 months, I'll likely replace them when they fail with the same ones, or possibly their successor.

In summary, they meet all my requirements and I'm very happy with them.

I finally bought these earbuds after years of considering and I am so glad I did! I was previously put off by the short battery life of such products and also because I wanted to use them with an iPhone and have found that Apple earphones are too large to fit my relatively small ears. (I have ended up buying childrens’ earphones and then putting the smallest foam tip on the ends and they still feel a bit too big). So when I saw that these came with several different sizes of ear pieces, were small in the first place and also had a good long battery life I decided to try some, and I’m so pleased I did! They fit nicely into my ears and the curly part makes sure they stay in place so you don’t have to force them into your ears to make them stay! I use them in the car and find I can hear the person I am speaking to far more clearly than when I was running my phone through the car’s audio system, and they have a similar experience. I assume this is because of the noise cancelling function. The battery has not run out on me yet and the little charging case is really neat. Altogether I really am thrilled with these and would highly recommend them. I love the colour too!

item13.description:

reviews:
I love these headphones, amazing battery life even if you use them all day, they'll literally last me weeks to a month. Great volume, they do leak a little but that's at high volume. Great with taking calls, they're fine in the rain, comfortable for long use, ive even worn them to bed and will lay on them.1000% worth the money and as my first pair of headphones i cant believe I've gone this long without a pair.

I don't really use them for the noise canceling feature, however i have used the feature and id say they work good for that. It's like sticking a conch to your ear, completely blocks out background noise like fans and does a good job muffling more concentrated sounds like talking or construction

The only thing that is negative is they are a little big, so while they have great extensions, I'd recommend a little caution if you have a small head. Also the pause and play button, while great with music and youtube, is a little finicky with streaming sites (hulu, netflix etc)

I bought these, hoping for a better outcome than I have had in the past with beats. And I am pleased to say that I haven't had any headaches or discomfort from these at all! I used to get horrible headaches from my beats because they would squeeze my noggin. These are definitely more comfortable and the sound quality is great! If you have the headphones above the 50% sound there is sound leakage.

My only complaint is that the noise cancelling feature doesn't seem to make a difference FOR ME, it may be because I am deaf in my right ear. I couldn't attest to this for hearing people. I will say that when I wear these that I am able to study even with my husky having zoomies.

Overall, these are an excellent, affordable option for someone who wants a good quality set of headphones but do not want to pay SONY or Beats prices.

I love these headphones so much, they’re great quality, the sound and bass are good for what you pay for. I love how aesthetically pleasing they are and add a little touch to your outfits. only disadvantage is, they sound leak and they smell weird when they’re first unpackaged. but the smell goes away after a few wears. overall tho 8.5/10 on these headphones.

So I wanted to wait and test them out for a while before I did a review. Had the headphones for over a month now and I love them! Very lightweight, the battery life is amazing, I don’t always use them so I didn’t have to charge them yet but the battery is at 80 I believe and that’s great! The only complaints i have is the sound leakage and noise cancellation. The sound does leak a bit but I don’t mind that. Noise cancellation has a weird sound but that’s only when you’re not listening to something, so i’m not sure if that’s common for noise cancellation or not. If you’re not a big fan on sound leak and the weird noise then probably not for you. Other than that, great headphones for the price!

I wanted a cute pair of headphones but I didn’t want to spend a lot of money. The style and color of these is really nice (I ordered silver) and I like how you can twist the ear pieces. However the sound leakage is horrific it’s pointless to even wear them because everyone around you can hear it too which defeats the purpose for me as I don’t really like people hearing what I’m listening to in public spaces. The video I posted I would say my volume was about 50% and some people may think that sound leakage is fine but it’s by biggest pet peeve with headphones. I was testing how loud I could put my music before others could hear it and I’d say I only got to about 25% volume on my iPhone before it was noticeable. So for me, a person who likes to listen to her music loud, this was a major no go so I am returning it and will probably just cave and get a nicer pair. I would say the quality of materials is probably comparable to the price although the plastic can look a little cheap up close but that didn’t bother me because I really liked the style. Sound and bass was good, noise cancellation is pretty good I guess nothing crazy. Bluetooth connecting was a little weird as well and I worry it may be an issue in the future. Sound leakage was a major dealbreaker for me tho. Embarrassed at the thought of everyone on a plane or in a coffee shop hearing my music so loudly so I’m gonna find a better pair.

Niedrogie, ale świetne słuchawki z doskonałą funkcją tłumienia hałasu.
W pokoju biurowym pracuję z kilkoma osobami, większość lubi słuchać radia, które mi przeszkadza, więc dotychczas wyłączaliśmy radio, gdy musieliśmy się skupić intensywnie na zadaniach. teraz zakładam słuchawki i radio mi nie przeszkadza.
Słuchawki są tak dobre w tłumieniu hałasu, że zastąpiłem nimi stare przewodowe bose, w których latałem samolotami. POLECAM

Good quality, no complaints
For the price point, it offers great features and borders on the premium range of headphones.

Har använt hörlurarna till arbete de senaste 3 åren och har aldrig önskat några bättre hörlurar. Ljudet är ganska bra, mikrofonen är dessutom bra, räckvidden är också bra. Enda nackdelen jag har funnit är att dem hänger sig då och då, och då kan man inte använda dem. Men för att fixa när hörlurarna har hängt sig så räcker det att man stoppar laddsladden så har hörlurarna blivit återställda.
Un peu lourd dur mes oreilles et le casque serré pas assez

Gratamente sorprendido con la calidad de estos "Srhytem NC 35"
Me los compré viendo las buenas opiniones que tenía y aprovechando un cupón descuento me tiré a por ellos.

En difinitiva,me encantan! El tiempo dirá si he acertado. Por poner una pega(que a mí no me afecta) es que el diadema es bastante grande. A mi me vienen justos sin tener que abrirlos,quiere decir que a los que tenéis las cabezas pequeñas talvez os venga grande.

item14.name: Meze 99 Classics over-ear headphones ( Walnut Gold ) (Renewed)
item14.description:
99 Classics entered Top 10 Best closed-back headphones of all time on head-fi forum and received the Wall of Fame on Innerfidelity. Frequency range: 15 Hz - 25 KHz, Impedance: 32 Ohm, Sensitivity 103 Db 1kHz/1mW POWER EFFICIENT WITH ANY DEVICE due to low impedance (32 Ohm). Works well with smartphones, being easy to drive. No need for amplification.
REAL WOOD EARCUPS are precision carved on a CNC machine and then hand finished and polished (the complete process lasts 45 days).
SELF-ADJUSTING PU HEADBAND spreads the weight out, so it comfortably fits all head sizes. Lightweight, only 9.2 ounces. Soft PU leather earpads with medium density memory foam for efficient passive noise isolation and increased comfort.
No glue, just nuts, and bolts. We guarantee that the 99 Classics are FULLY SERVICEABLE if any parts would ever need to be replaced because we built these headphones to last.
INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: Hard EVA carrying pouch, detachable 1.2m thread Kevlar OFC cable with mic and remote, detachable 3m thread Kevlar OFC cable, 6.3mm gold-plated jack, airplane jack adapter, cable pouch.
reviews: Been a long time since I’ve had over the ear headphones and the sound is amazing. Compared to the earbuds I was using it’s night and day. My neighbors at work appreciate NOT hearing what I’m listening to. Very lightweight and comfortable all day long.

item15.name: Intoberp Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear, 40 Hours Playtime Wireless Headphones with Microphone,Foldable Light Weight Headset with HiFi Stereo Sound for Travel Work (Beige)
item15.description:
🎵[Advanced Noise Cancellation Technology] The noise canceling headphones adopt advanced ENC technology to reduce noise in crowded and noisy environments like aviation. Reducing ambient noises by up to 96%, it enables you to immerse yourself into your preferred music, movies, audiobooks, or videos without distracting sounds.
🎵[40+Hour Longer Playtime] A built-in battery keeps your wireless Bluetooth headphones stay powered, so you can enjoy your world without noise for 40 hours long time on a single charge. Plus, plug in 3.5mm stereo audio cable to extend the playtime when in a low battery level.
🎵[HiFi Audio Sound] Intoberp ENC headphones equipped with cutting-edge 40mm drivers bring clear, rich and remarkable wireless music, which will help you enjoy music better. Revel in undisturbed listening with fully balanced bass and high-fidelity tones in extraordinary clarity.
🎵[Clear Hands-Free Calling] Bluetooth headphones are built-in HD microphone with advanced audio sign processing enabling clear and hands-free calling. Easy to pause, play, skip tracks, volume, activate your voice assistant, and answer phone calls via handy button control.
🎵[Stunning Wireless Performance] with Bluetooth 5.3, our wireless headphones offer a more stable transmission, lower latency, and better audio output, which give you wonderful music enjoyment. Wide compatibility makes it ideal for travel, home, office, and outdoor.
reviews:
Disclaimer: i do color my hair a lot so sometimes the color bleeds onto my personal items so I wasn’t shocked that the ear cushions became stained so just keep that in mind. It doesn’t really effect the quality just became a light blue tint only on the cushion area.
They’re honestly super comfortable & really do cancel out all noises. As someone who has bad ADHD, they keep me super hyperfocused because I really can’t hear anything outside of them which is a blessing for me. I had to take the trash out today & forgot my phone upstairs, not once did the music even glitch. I was at least a good many feet from my room too since I had to go outside so that really shocked me since most headphones tend to cut out after you move away a certain feet from your phone. They’re also super easy to pair with any connection as they’re paired to 3 of my devices. I also love that they can fold since that makes it easier to fit into my bags. Definitely recommend!

these are pretty good they can connect to two devices at once which was super helpful to me doing homework and going between tasks. they’re a little tricky to set up on my mac book pro and they’re a little more bulky than i expected but they’re comfy, block sound pretty well and are a gorgeous colour. I also have to mention how much i love the fact they fold up and get compact. it’s perfect for putting in my school bag on the go. over all great price with a few minor things here and there!!

Great sound quality for the price. The noise-cancelling worked like a charm and was exactly what the kids needed for our flights. Bluetooth was easy to pair and the wired option was great to have during the flight. They were comfortable to wear for long periods. Overall good choice for affordable noise-cancelling headphones.
The sound is amazing and the battery life is really long! Real easy for my 12 her old to connect to also!!

Granted they are still pretty new to me, but I am a huge fan of these!!
I had been looking for good over the ear headphones for the gym and this is the second pair I’ve bought, but my favorite thus far!
My other pair are Phillips and are fine, but these are big, comfortable and I’m so impressed with the sound quality as well as the noise cancelation they have!
Some reviews complained about phone calls, and FaceTime calls with them but I have no complaints!
Very happy with my purchase!!

I did enjoy the headphones and the size of them. One problem is the static that is created when using your phone with them. I used them as a board op, (corded), so whenever I used my phone I had interference. I can't have that due to the position I'm in because I thought it was the broadcast until I realized what was happening. Speaking of corded - I didn't realize it came with a 3.5mm cord because one didn't come included. I use a different one (longer) that I bought separately, so I didn't need it thankfully, which is why I didn't check for one. They're nice headphones, but just didn't work for what I needed them for.

I imagine these don't have the best sound quality in comparison to other, more expensive alternatives. That said, they work well for me on my walks and in the office. I love the color, it's easy to set up, and the battery has lasted for weeks without a charge. I'm tempted to buy another pair so I can keep one at work and one in my car for hikes.
Great comfort and quality

item16.name: Puro Sound Labs JuniorJam Plus Volume Limiting Headphones for Kids, Safer Audio to Protect Hearing- Adjustable Bluetooth Headphones for Tablets, Smartphones, PCs- 22-Hour Battery Life, Purple
item16.description:
HEAR TO PROTECT – Ordinary headphones let kids jam out at any volume, including dangerous ones. Over time, those rocking volumes damage their eardrums and can even lead to noise-induced hearing loss. Protect your kid’s hearing with JuniorJams, the headphones that limit harmful volumes over 85 dB!
SOUNDS OUTSTANDING – Limiting the volume doesn’t mean suffering through poor sound quality. Puro Sound Labs kid headphones emit crystal-clear sounds thanks to their advanced sound-optimizing Puro Balanced Response Curve that isolates 87% of ambient noise!
FEWER WIRES, MORE FREEDOM – Tired of tangled wires? Puro Sound Labs headphones for kids feature wireless Bluetooth v4.0 technology with a 30-ft. range! USB-C charging allows for quick and efficient charging, while the Lithium-ion battery gives you 22 hours of play time.
COMFORT THAT ADJUSTS – No matter how long people wear these teen and toddler headphones; they stay comfortable song after song. Plush vegan leather covers the ear cups and headband in softness while the durable, yet lightweight plastic frame is flexible and adjusts to fit.
THE PURO SOUND LABS PROMISE – At Puro Sound Labs, we strive to provide hearing protection for kids without diminishing their listening experience. We promise that your JuniorJams Volume Limiting Headphones offer superior sound quality with premium ear protection, and it’s all backed by a 1-year warranty.

item17.name: ClearCall 70 - Bluetooth Headphones with Microphone + Removable Boom Mic - Work Headphones Wireless Bluetooth, Over Ear Headphones with Mic, Work from Home Headset with Mic, Headphones for Laptop
item17.description:
With a removable boom mic, these headphones easily transform from Bluetooth work headphones into a sleek pair of fashionable headphones, this is the best Bluetooth headset if you want to use it after work
Take clear calls in noisy environments, the AI noise-cancelling microphone cuts out 99% of background noise so you sound load and clear, the wireless headset with microphone for PC, Mac, iPhone and Android works on any device
With 45 hours of battery life, one charge lasts for a full work-week plus overtime, the wireless headphones with microphone for work have the most battery in a work from home headset with microphone
Easily switch between sound modes for a tailored listening experience, these Bluetooth headphones with mic have immersive sound, this wireless PC headset isn't just for phone calls it sounds amazing
Luxuriously soft over-ear cups on this work headset with microphone put no pressure on your ears, this wireless head set teams headset is compatible with Zoom calls and more
reviews:
UPDATE-
I had some initial difficulties connecting to my work PC but turns out it was due to drivers on my PC, contacted costumer service and they patiently and helpfully give me pointers to find the issue, always assuring me that if the headphones were indeed damage I could get them changed ASAP.
But no need, once drivers were fixed it connected like a charm, have them on my phone for music while working and for audio messages coming in, but whenever a zoom call comes through these bad boys switch almost seemlesly to the PC and once the call is done I go back to my music without pressing any buttons or doing anything. Sound quality of the mic is superb both with or without the boom mic but definitely clearer with the mic. Sound profile is also really good for my taste, bassy and clear, they're super lightweight and feel very sturdy, got a few compliments for them as they look sexy AF I'm my opinion. Give them a go, you'll be pleasantly surprised

Previous review:
Good bang for your buck headphones, well built, the battery last a fair amount of time and the sound quality is really good, the passive noise cancelling due to the headphone construction is also a nice plus, especially in a crowded office. BUT I wasn't able to use the microphone at all, it just won't connect to my computer, when the driver changes to the microphone the headset goes out completely, no sound, no response, as soon as I switch to just audio it works well so it didn't work at all for what I needed it but as a normal pair of headphones it is really good

These are really incredible. Excellent sound and comfort and really lightweight for a rechargeable, over-the-ear headphone.

Connection to bluetooth is very simple and they stay connected. Battery life is fantastic as well.

I especially LOVE that the boom mic is removeable, so if you're just listening to music you can leave it off, and if you are on a business call or video meeting you can add it on for more precise voice while muting peripheral noises. Even without the boom mic attached, the headset has a built in mic that works just fine, so you don't have to remove your earphones when answering a call.

This is the 3rd different BackBay product I've purchased, and I've found them to be extremely well designed, manufactured, and of high quality with long-lasting battery life.

This is a good product although I feel the buttons are too close. You have to be careful when you are trying to turn up or down the volume and you are talking to someone you may accidentally press the button in the center and disconnect the call. The volume buttons could be a little more raised in order to avoid an accidental disconnect. I liked the fact that I could wear the headset on top of my earplugs when I was on the airplane so I could hear my movie.
This Bluetooth headset connected very quickly to my phone without any problems. Easy to set up. The sound is very clear when listening to music as well as holding a conversation. Overall, I feel this is a very good Bluetooth headset for the money. I would definitely recommend it to others.

I've been working from home for a few years now, and I've tried a lot of different headphones over the years. Nothing has compared to the ClearCall 70 headphones at this price point.

The sound quality is excellent, both for listening to music and for taking calls. The microphone does a great job of blocking out background noise, so my callers can hear me clearly even when I'm working in a noisy environment.

The headphones are also very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. The ear cups are soft and plush, and the headband is adjustable so I can find a perfect fit.

Overall, I highly recommend the ClearCall 70 headphones for anyone looking for a high-quality, comfortable, and versatile pair of headphones.

I do like the sound of the headphones overall. The fit is a little off, but doable. Finish seems good.
The mic went out after just a couple uses.
Amazon return period has expired. Waiting on manufacturer response. Will update if I hear back and they handle to my satisfaction.

I recently had the opportunity to try out the Back Bay Clear All 70 wireless headphones, and I must say, I was quite impressed with their performance. These headphones offer a winning combination of exceptional sound quality, comfortable fit, and convenient wireless connectivity.

Starting with the audio quality, the Clear All 70 headphones delivered a rich and immersive listening experience. The sound reproduction was clear, well-balanced, and detailed across different genres of music. Whether I was listening to energetic rock tracks or mellow acoustic melodies, the headphones provided a dynamic range that enhanced the overall enjoyment.

The wireless connectivity of the Clear All 70 headphones worked flawlessly. The Bluetooth connection remained stable, allowing me to move around without any interruptions or dropouts in audio. The pairing process was quick and hassle-free, and I appreciated the extended range that allowed me to stay connected to my device even when I moved away from it.
I’ve been using these since I got them. Comfort and clarity are on another level. Definitely recommend.

item18.name: Edifier W800BT Plus Wireless Headphones Over-Ear Headset - Qualcomm® aptX - Bluetooth V5.1 - CVC™ 8.0 Call Noise Cancelling - 55H Playtime - Built-in Microphone - Physical Button and App Control, Red
item18.description:
Enjoy Premium Sound: Punchy bass with large sound field offered by 40mm NdFeB driver delivers and Qualcomm aptX
Extended Playtime: The headphones provide over 55 hours of high-quality playback time
Clear Call: Built-in microphone with Qualcomm cVc 8.0 Noise Cancellation, the headphones pick up voices and eliminates environmental noise, leading to clearer communication during calls
All-Day Comfort: the earmuffs made of soft leather which are designed with 15° inclination, the head beam can be stretched, all providing a comfortable wearing experience
Easily Switch 2 Devices: Support connecting with two Bluetooth devices simultaneously
Personalize Your Listening: EDIFIER CONNECT provides a more intelligent and personalized listening experience
reviews: I love these headphones! I have a fairly large head and they adjust to fit perfectly. They are very light and comfortable. The battery life is amazing. I usually listen an hour or two a day and only have to charge them every few weeks. I think the sound quality is good, but I am usually listening to audiobooks--so I'm not sure that is the best test for sound quality. There isn't active noise canceling, but the over-the-ear cups do a good job of blocking out outside noise. I've taken some phone calls while I'm wearing them and it's easy to hear the phone and easy for the person I'm talking to to hear me. I would recommend these headphones!

The battery lasts forever, they're crazy comfortable, the bluetooth connection is super easy, they sound great (though I'm not an expert in this area), and there's no active noise cancelling! I'm one of those people who finds noise cancelling makes me feel pressure in my ears, but good luck finding bluetooth over ear headphones without that feature! The best thing about these is how comfortable they are. I'd returned a few pairs already and was considering buying one of the super expensive noise cancelling headsets (which allow you to turn the noise cancelling off) just to get something that wouldn't squish my ears and head (both of which are on the large side). But these are perfect! And affordable! I was skeptical that the battery life would be good at this price but it is truly excellent. Only thing I don't love is how long you have to long press the button to turn them on and off (a long time), but that's just something to get used to.

What They Are: Lightweight, Stylish, and Comfy!

What They’re Not: Noise Cancelling

These headphones offer solid performance at an affordable price point. While they may not deliver anything extraordinary, it's unrealistic to expect that from a pair of headphones priced below a couple hundred dollars. The overall quality is decent, and the sound output is satisfactory. However, it's worth noting that external noises are only partially muffled, so complete sound isolation from your surroundings isn't achieved.

One noticeable drawback is that the sound occasionally pauses for a moment when switching between apps on your phone, which can be a bit annoying. Nevertheless, considering their price range, these headphones are on par with other options available in the $30-$50 range.

In conclusion, if you're seeking a budget-friendly pair of headphones that offer decent audio quality without breaking the bank, these headphones are a reasonable choice. Just keep in mind the minor inconvenience of sound pauses during app switching.

They're comfortable and last all week with their battery life. Good value for the price and they look nice. The low end of the sound isn't super strong, so may not be the right headphone for you if you're looking for it. The app it comes with its also not very helpful and ended up not using it at all since I couldn't adjust the eq.

They sound great. Battery lasts a long time. Very comfortable. Good range. I use them for work calls and everyone reports the mic quality is good. I'm kind of amazed you can get something this good for this less than $50. Replaced airpods pro and don't regret it.
Quality through out

for the price, these are so much better than i thought they would be! sound quality isn't the best, but it gets the job done. battery life is incredible!! used these for a 10 hour car ride and the battery only went down 15-20%! doesn't completely block out outside noise, but muffles it very well. would definitely recommend these!

These are my first pair of Bluetooth headphones, and I'd say they're alright. I've been wanting to get a pair of Bluetooth headphones for awhile now and finally settled on these ones.
As someone who's never been too concerned with top tier sound quality these are good for the price. It did take me a few days to get used to the sound, but now they're good and the quality doesn't bother me at all. The app you can download and connect these to is alright but it doesn't offer a lot of choices.
These are SUPER comfy. As someone who wears glasses, I haven't had a problem with the stems digging into my head at all which is really nice. The cups go all the way over your ears and they fit near perfectly for me.
The battery life is really good too. They were at 74% out of the box and I've been using them constantly for a few days now, sometimes accidently leaving them on overnight, and they're only down to 62%.
I have had an occasional problem where it glitches out occasionally but disconnecting and then reconnecting fixes that problem. There is some slight hissing occasionally but it doesnt happen often so it doesn't really annoy me. There is quite a bit of sound bleed however. If you have you're volume turned up over halfway you're gonna hear some bleed. It's not a ton, but it's enough to hear from a few feet away.

Estou usando há alguns meses e simplesmente amei o fone. O isolamento de ruído não é super eficiente mas ajuda bastante. É muito confortável e o som é muito bom. A bateria dura bastante! não uso todo os dias, e nem por muito tempo. mas desde que comprei só carreguei 2 vezes. Ahh ele não dobra. Mas recomendo bastante!

La verdad suenan excelente, solo que en ocasiones tienen interferencia (con apagarlos y reiniciar el bt del receptor queda).
Por el precio me parecen una muy buena opción.

Ho sempre e solo avuto cuffie a filo, dalla Koss porta pro in poi. Ho letto le recensioni molto positive per queste cuffie qua, e mi sono deciso di comprarle. Sinceramente non mi aspettavo grandi cose. Anche dal punto di vista della comodità, perché io ho un bel testone e non è facile trovare delle cuffie a padiglione chiuso che mi stiano bene. Devo dire che dovevo comprarle prima. A livello ergonomico sono perfette con un design che non avevo mai visto prima ,leggermente inclinato rispetto ai padiglioni, è sono di una comodità
unica. Isolano bene dal resto dell'ambiente. La resa acustica è ottima. Con alcune applicazioni è sbilanciata verso i bassi che qualche volta prendono il sopravvento, però basta agire con un semplice equalizzatore e le cose tornano a posto. Per adesso usate circa tre ore, con grande gusto, batteria ancora all'84%. Non posso fare confronti diretti perché prima di queste non avevo mai comperato cuffie bluetooth. Ma a questo prezzo sono soldi ben spesi.
Très bon son

Le compré estos auriculares a mi mujer y está muy contenta. Yo mismo los he probado y puedo decir que son ligeros, cómodos y aunque no tienen cancelación de ruido activa, los auriculares aíslan bastante bien de forma pasiva. El sonido es correcto y puede funcionar con batería vía bluetooth. La duración de la batería anuncia 40 horas, no lo he comprobado. Pero más de 20h si que aguantan. Sonido en llamadas y micrófono que cumple su función en exterior paseando en ciudad. Además si te quedas sin batería siempre puedes usarlo con un Jack 3,5 de toda la vida, como unos cascos normales. No he notado diferencia de sonido escuchando música vía bluetooth o cable. Pero seguramente es debido a que la música la escuchaba de YouTube, donde la calidad de sonido ya viene limitada de por sí. En algún momento me bajaré algún álbum versión CD y compararé mejor. Después de probarlos, me he quedado con las ganas de comprar y ver cómo serán los 820 nb plus. Ahora en oferta por black friday. Pero bueno el año que viene ya veré si me doy el capricho.

item19.name: YMOO Bluetooth 5.2 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones for Airplane Travel, Wired and Wireless ANC Headphones, 75H Playtime Over Ear Headphones, Bluetooth Headset with Mic for Adults (Y7)
item19.description:
𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵-𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗺𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗰: YMOO Y7 Noise Cancelling Headphones has a 40mm dynamic speaker, high-end bio-diaphragm, and master tuning. In terms of sound performance, the bass is powerful, the mid-frequency is soft, and the treble is beautiful. The highly flexible silk diaphragm reproduces powerful lows and clear highs up to 40kHz.
𝗔𝗡𝗖 𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗲-𝗳𝗲𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗻𝗼𝗶𝘀𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Our product has built-in 3 ANC microphones and fine-tuned digital active noise reduction algorithm. Therefore, when you turn on the ANC noise reduction mode, it can detect and cancel a wide range of low-frequency and mid-frequency noises, such as the noise of cars and aircraft engines. 𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗲: 𝗔𝗡𝗖 𝗶𝘀 𝗻𝗼𝘁 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗲
𝗕𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘁𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝟱.𝟮 𝘄𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘀𝗲𝘁: YMOO Y7 wireless headset uses the most advanced Bluetooth 5.2 technology, which can provide a stable connection up to 50Ft. You put your mobile phone on the first floor and go up to the second floor with headphones on, it can still provide stable and clear sound without the sound of current.
𝟳𝟱 𝗛𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘀 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲: YMOO Y7 Over Ear Headphones has a built-in 600mAh battery, which can play music for up to 50 hours in noise canceling mode. Standard mode extends playtime to 75 hours. Charging once, you don't need to worry about power problems for a week.
𝗪𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗪𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗱𝗽𝗵𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘀: It is not only a wireless Bluetooth headset, but also can be used as a wired Studio Monitor headset through our included 3.5m to type-c audio cable. It is very convenient to use as a computer headset at home or on a business trip. We also included an airplane adapter, which allows you to connect the audio of the airplane, so that you can accompany your airplane journey with music.
𝗣𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗲-𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁: It comes with ultra-soft protein leather earcups and memory foam padding, which is pain-free and clip-free for long-term wear. It has a telescopic rod adjustment and a foldable design, when folded, it is only the size of a palm, very convenient to carry.
reviews: It works really well I pay a lot more of other ones and this was just as goodwas just as good

They work so well, the sound quality is fantastic and once you get to know the buttons very easy to use. They are so much better that my last pair (different brand) the battery lasts a long long time and yet charges quickly, also very comfortable to wear. By far the best I have ever bought, well worth the price.

Pros:
Battery - I charge mine maybe twice in a month. 10/10
Sound quality - To me they sound like the quality you would expect for this price point. This is a non-skimping price point and it shows. 9/10
ANC - works well for me. If you're looking for headphone that block out everything without the help of audio, these are not them. 8/10
Transparency - Also works as you should expect. 8/10
Overall Score - 9/10

My daughter told me what she wanted in one of these, and pointed out a 350 Sony units characteristics. Can't afford that, but these seemed to have what she liked in a Sony for a fraction of the price. She said they work real well. The only thing that doesn't completely live to the claims is the noise cancelling feature, she said it's pretty good, but not completely silent. But still for the price, I recommend.
Ordered these for a long-haul flight to Asia. Worked great, was super comfortable, and had a long-lasting charge. I appreciated the soft carry bag instead of harder case which are often bulky.
I like corded headphones. I like the fact that these were hybrid. Feel great on my head, sound good with bluetooth, but they sound absolutely terrible with the cord.
Used them on a recent cross country plane trip. They worked well.

I ordered two pairs for a long plane ride. They were perfect! The headphones kept the noise out so we could sleep easily. The headphones came with cords in different sizes. The cords worked great on the plane screens. We also had blue tooth connectors for the screens and the headphones functioned! All fit in the little bag that was included.
Items received a day early which was great. Working OK , just need to test the noise reduction option when we next travel.

tout est parfait dans ce casque, sauf le coté hifi, car c'est juste une bonne écoute mais plus adaptée à la télé qu'à la hifi
il tient longtemps sans être chargé, 8 à 10 jours environ suivant la durée d'écoute quotidienne
il est léger et repose bien autour des oreilles
les réglages sont faciles
le volume sonore est excellent ce qui est rare sur les casques BT
bref je l'utilise tous les jours

The sound and noise cancelling are both good. Not full noise cancelling, but worked well on the plane. I not sure why you can't use the ANC when you have them plugged in, but almost everything is Bluetooth now, so it's not a big deal.

Le produit est vraiment bon, pourquoi la réduction d'une étoile ? Car l'ensemble est quand même hyper simple et la réduction de bruit moyenne. Aussi le son est très porté sur les graves (après ça dépend des goûts ça). Ce produit vaut largement 5 étoiles s'il est trouvé sous les 50.

Les plus :
+ La construction est bonne et les finitions sont bien aussi, son format reste compact je trouve pour un casque de ce type, il sera adapté aux petites et grandes têtes, un peu moins au toutes petites.
+ Rechargeable en usb-c et bonne autonomie (mais comptez moins que 75h en mode anti-bruit, aux alentours de 40h je dirai, mais c'est variable en fonction de votre volume d'écoute)
+ Pas mal d'accessoires (câble usb-c vers jack, adaptateur avion, câble de charge usb-c vers usb classique (un peu court 1 mètre), une sacoche souple de transport (mais elle est basique))
+ Très agréable à porter même pendant de longues heures
+ larges coussinets qui couvrent bien les oreilles
+ micro intégré pour passer et recevoir des appels (le son sera dégradé à ce moment mais c'est normal)
+ se replie jusqu'à être très compact si besoin (rotation des coussinets et des axes)

Les moins :
- L'ANC (anti-bruit) n'a que deux modes, on ou off (accessible avec le bouton ANC latéral du bas, quand il est actif il y a une lumière verte
- Les annonces sonores sont bruyantes et lentes (notamment lorsqu'on met l'anc en on ou off)
- ANC désactivé si vous utilisez le mode filaire
- L'ANC est automatiquement off quand vous rallumez l'appareil, il ne garde pas le choix
- Trop de basses, mais le son reste agréable au global (il sature uniquement à très haut niveau)

Cela reste un très bon produit si vous le trouvez à moindre coût, les boutons et réglagles :
> +
> -
> ON/OFF (en restant appuyé)
> ANC (avec une led qui indique s'il est on ou off et une annonce sonore)
> Arceau qui à des crans bien marqués qui tiennent bien, permet d'ajouter 3,5cm de chaques côtés environ
> Prise en charge des assistants vocaux
> Pendant la charge si la lumière est rouge c'est qu'il charge, led éteinte signifie que c'est complet

S'il dispose d'une promo n'hésitez pas.
Comfortable to wear, bass is ok, easy to use.
item19.detail:
YMOO Bluetooth 5.2 Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling Headphones for Airplane Travel, Wired and Wireless ANC Headphones, 75H Playtime Over Ear Headphones, Bluetooth Headset with Mic for Adults (Y7) 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵-𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗺𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗰: YMOO Y7 Noise Cancelling Headphones has a 40mm dynamic speaker, high-end bio-diaphragm, and master tuning. In terms of sound performance, the bass is powerful, the mid-frequency is soft, and the treble is beautiful. The highly flexible silk diaphragm reproduces powerful lows and clear highs up to 40kHz.
𝗔𝗡𝗖 𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗹𝗲-𝗳𝗲𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗻𝗼𝗶𝘀𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Our product has built-in 3 ANC microphones and fine-tuned digital active noise reduction algorithm. Therefore, when you turn on the ANC noise reduction mode, it can detect and cancel a wide range of low-frequency and mid-frequency noises, such as the noise of cars and aircraft engines. 𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗲: 𝗔𝗡𝗖 𝗶𝘀 𝗻𝗼𝘁 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗲
𝗕𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘁𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝟱.𝟮 𝘄𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗵𝗲𝗮𝗱𝘀𝗲𝘁: YMOO Y7 wireless headset uses the most advanced Bluetooth 5.2 technology, which can provide a stable connection up to 50Ft. You put your mobile phone on the first floor and go up to the second floor with headphones on, it can still provide stable and clear sound without the sound of current.
𝟳𝟱 𝗛𝗼𝘂𝗿𝘀 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲: YMOO Y7 Over Ear Headphones has a built-in 600mAh battery, which can play music for up to 50 hours in noise canceling mode. Standard mode extends playtime to 75 hours. Charging once, you don't need to worry about power problems for a week.
𝗪𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗪𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗛𝗲𝗮𝗱𝗽𝗵𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘀: It is not only a wireless Bluetooth headset, but also can be used as a wired Studio Monitor headset through our included 3.5m to type-c audio cable. It is very convenient to use as a computer headset at home or on a business trip. We also included an airplane adapter, which allows you to connect the audio of the airplane, so that you can accompany your airplane journey with music.
𝗣𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗲-𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁: It comes with ultra-soft protein leather earcups and memory foam padding, which is pain-free and clip-free for long-term wear. It has a telescopic rod adjustment and a foldable design, when folded, it is only the size of a palm, very convenient to carry.

item20.name: JBL Tune 710BT - Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Bundle with Deluxe CCI Carrying Case (White)
item20.description:
DELUXE BUNDLE - Includes (1) JBL Tune 710BT Wireless Over-Ear Bluetooth Headphones and (1) Deluxe CCI Carrying Case
50 Hour Wireless Bluetooth Streaming - Enjoy high-qualiy sound all-day-long thanks to the 50 hours battery life, or extend the fun endlessly with the included detachable audio cable
JBL Pure Bass Sound - For over 70 years, JBL has engineered the precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. These headphones reproduce that same JBL sound, punching out bass that’s both deep and powerful
reviews: Dislike

item21.name: Wireless Earbud, 75Hrs Bluetooth 5.3 Headphones IP7 Waterproof for Sport, Running Wireless Earphones with ENC Noise Canceling Mics, Deep Bass Over Ear bud with Earhooks for Android, iOS, Workout, Gym
item21.description:
75Hrs Playtime & Dual Power Display: Each ear bud offers up to 15 hours of listening time on a single charge, allowing you to enjoy a total of 75 hours of music by taking turns with the charging case. Wireless earbud feature a dual LED digital display that provides real-time charging case’s remaining power and ear bud wireless bluetooth charging status and plan your usage accordingly. Say goodbye to battery anxiety! Bluetooth headphones support wired charging with a Type-C cable(included in the package).
Fit for Movement and IP7 Waterproof: Designed with flexible and soft ear hooks, earbud wireless bluetooth running fit perfectly in your ears and stay focused on your exercise routine without worrying about falling out. To provide you with customized comfort, 3 multiple sizes of ear tips(S/M/L) are available. At the same time, wireless headphones has an IP7 waterproof rating, which can resist sweat, rain and minor water splashes during exercising, sporting, gym, cycling etc.
Button Control and Auto Pairing: These wireless earphones featured with the funcational button,you can click the button to switch the music,adjust volume, answer/end phone calls,activate voice assistant. After first pairing successfully, these bluetooth wireless earphones will connect with your previous device automatically once you take out wireless earphones bluetooth, providing more convenient and faster using experience. The connect range between wireless earbud bluetooth and device is about 48 feet.
Bluetooth 5.3 Technology and Extensive Compatibility: Wireless Bluetooth headphones are powered by advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology, minimizing the chances of interference and disconnections. This ensures a faster and more stable connection between the Bluetooth earphones inear and your devices. These wireless earphones for sports are compatible with almost all Bluetooth-enabled devices such as iOS, Android cellphones, TV, smart watches, PC, tablets, laptops, and more (Not compatible with gaming devices).
Hi-Fi Sound Quality & HD Voice Technology: Bluetooth headphones sports incorporate 14.2mm double-layer diaphragm drivers, delivering sound with strong bass, clear mids, and bright treble. Experience high-fidelity sound reproduction that brings every note and detail to life, enhancing your music listening experience. The environmental noise cancelling built-in microphones ensure high-quality call performance by isolating your voice from surrounding noise. Enjoy uninterrupted conversations with superior clarity, regardless of your location.
reviews: Lightweight - great audio and sound. Perfect pair of wrap around earphones for use during workout whether at the gym or running and jogging. Stays put and out of the way. Very comfortable to wear and great battery life to get lost in your favorite songs. Must have at a great price.

I bought these after trying over the ear noise blocking headphones on an airplane ride.
These do such a better job of blocking out sounds and the volume is amazing. I love how each ear bud works independent of the other one, so I can just wear one if I want. Best part is since they fit in my ear instead of over my ear, they help keep my ears from hurting when the plane lands and takes off. Super easy to set up!
Love the minimal packaging, and how the earbuds fit so snugly in the case. Price was good, too. Thanks for a quality product at a great price! Overall a great product!

I ride motorcycle alot and prefer to wear earbuds to stop the wind buffeting. I hate helmets and never wore them before I moved to a state that requires them by law. Now, I wear a half helmet. Full face helmets are superior in that they stop the wind buffeting. Bring in earbuds. They stop the buffeting, play music, and make the ride way more enjoyable. I've owned a lot of earbuds I thought were superior fit and never would fall out, but eventually, they all did. I don't know if you've ever had an earbud fallout on the highway at 70-80mph, but finding said earbud, is like a needle in a haystack. Then I got these. I've had them a month so far, countless hours of riding later, I've recharged the case once, and am currently sitting at 49%. It feels like the case holds 100 recharges, it's insane! The hooks, the main reason I bought them, are soft, feel great, and have kept me from losing one of these going down the highway about 3 times now! I have really small ear canals and the smallest extra bud they provide fits very well. The audio is amazing for the price point and they get loud enough to block out the world. They're not sennheisers or beyerdynamics, but they definitely hold their own to headphones in their price range. I don't use the buttons on the earbuds since I have a phone mount on my motorcycle, so I can't speak to their usage. Overall, I am actually very satisfied with these headphones! I have already recommended them to a few riders and will keep recommending them

I've gone through a bunch of wireless earbuds, and let me tell you, my last ones were a disaster. They kept doing swan dives into the dishwasher – not cool. I had to get creative and tie a string to them so they wouldn't take a watery plunge every time they slipped out.

But hey, I finally got my hands on this pair, and they're a game-changer. They've got these hooks that snugly sit over my ears, comfy as heck, and the battery life? Unreal! Sound quality and volume? Top-notch. Seriously, I should've snagged these before dealing with all those lousy ones!

I recently got my hands on the Wireless Earbud with 75Hrs Playtime, and it's safe to say these earbuds are a game-changer, especially for those with an active lifestyle. Designed with flexible ear hooks, these earbuds stay put during the most intense workouts. No worries about them falling out. The three sizes of ear tips add a personal touch to the comfort factor. And with an IP7 waterproof rating, they're ready to take on sweat, rain, or whatever else you throw at them during your workouts. Whether you're hitting the gym or just chilling, these earbuds deliver a premium audio experience that elevates your every move. Highly recommended for those who demand the best from their tech.

I like this style of headphone because the have the physical button to press to pause/play. Many headphones of this type don’t have this feature. They also have physical buttons for volume control, so you aren’t tapping at your ears over and over trying to turn down the volume. The battery life is great and the sound quality is solid. The case could be a tiny bit easier to open, but that is a pretty tiny drawback.

Amazing wireless headphones! Great quality sound with a bottomless battery. They also charge very quickly so you are never missing out. I also like how compact they are in their case, I can charge, protect, and not lose them in the handy case. I have had many headphones like this but this is hands down my favorite and at this price its an amazing value. I would buy again for myself or as a gift!
Great sound and good noise cancelling. They stay on ears well.

Hallo,
ich habe In Ear Kopfhörer fürs Laufen gesucht, da die ohne Bügel immer heraus fallen.
Hier meine Bewertung nach 1 Woche intensiver Nutzung.
Sitzt super, klarer Sound, vernünftiger Bass, da ich gern mit Beats laufe, wichtig!
Klasse ist auch die Ladebox. Die Laufzeit reicht in jedem Fall für ein paar Trainingseinheiten.
Im Nachhinein habe ich blöder Weise abends die Buds wieder in die Box gepackt und daher waren sie am nächsten Tag wieder voll 🙈
Zusammenfassend:
1 Stern umweltfreundliche Verpackung (klein aber fein) +schickes Design 😎
1 Stern Tragekomfort ( inkl. anderer Adapter)
1 Stern für sehr guten Klang
1 Stern für eine deutsche Beschreibung
1 Stern für das gute Preis / Leistubgsverhältnis

Ich hoffe ich konnte euch bei eurer Entscheidung helfen😎

In my opinion these earbuds are very good. The sound quality is impressive, the drivers are 14mm so bigger than most other buds. This larger size gives you a deeper bass and a bigger frequency response. They have a built in noise cancelling microphone for calls and have next/previous track, pause/play, volume up/down and power on/off physical control buttons on the buds, which are easy to use and easy to get to whilst wearing them.
The over ear hooks are very secure and don't fall out when out running.
The buds themselves are a little bigger than others I have owned, but the size doesn't cause me any issues, even if worn whilst lying down in bed for example.
Charging is easy with the included USB c cable, and the case charges the buds whilst they are inside. It also has a charge % indicator so you know when the battery needs charging.
Overall they seem good value for money and I would recommend.
Se escuchan muy bien y la batería dura mucho. Además son muy cómodos para hacer deporte porque se adaptan genial. Los acabados increíbles.

Je cherchais des écouteurs pratique pour les séances de sport ! Les voilà

Bonne autonomie d’écoute ; le fait d’avoir un boîtier vomit pouvoir les ranger et les charger c’est vraiment pratique

Le son est bon ! Pas de grésillement… ils tiennent bien en place dans l’oreille

Très facile à connecter en Bluetooth

Bref je valide à 100% car vu le prix c’est vraiment un très bon rapport qualité prix

Ho acquistato le Cuffie Sportive Wireless, perchè amo il rosso e non potrei essere più soddisfatta del mio acquisto. Queste cuffie sono diventate il mio compagno di allenamento ideale i.

La loro resistenza al sudore le rende perfette per l'uso durante l'attività fisica. Non importa se sto correndo all'aperto o facendo esercizi in palestra, queste cuffie restano saldamente al loro posto, garantendo una vestibilità comoda e stabile. Non ho mai dovuto preoccuparmi di doverle sistemare durante il mio allenamento.

La qualità del suono è eccezionale. Bassi potenti e chiarezza audio cristallina mi consentono di godere appieno della mia musica o dei podcast preferiti durante l'allenamento. Inoltre, la connessione wireless è affidabile e non ho mai sperimentato interruzioni o perdite di segnale.

Una caratteristica che ho particolarmente apprezzato è la durata della batteria. Le cuffie durano a lungo senza bisogno di ricaricarle frequentemente. Sono riuscita a utilizzarle per diverse sessioni di allenamento senza problemi, il che è un grande vantaggio per me.

Inoltre, il design rosso è accattivante e elegante. Le cuffie hanno un aspetto molto sportivo e si adattano perfettamente al mio stile. Sono anche dotate di comandi intuitivi per la regolazione del volume e la gestione delle chiamate, il che rende l'esperienza d'uso ancora più semplice.

Non posso fare altro che raccomandarle vivamente a tutti coloro che cercano cuffie affidabili, resistenti e dal suono eccezionale.

item22.name: Samson SR350 Over Ear Stereo Headphones, (SASR350) ,Black
item22.description:
Product Type:Headphones
Item Package Dimension:8.636 cm L X 17.018 cm W X 24.13 cm H
Country Of Origin: China
Item Package Weight:0.272 kg
reviews:
Bought these for about $14 US back in July 2022 and have been using them for casual music listening, video games, and watching videos. No complaints so far!

The ear cups are large enough such that they fit over your ears (instead of the horribly uncomfortable on-ear headphones) and I'm able to wear them for >2 hours without getting sore ears. They don't fold, however the headband is extendable. Regarding sound quality, it's passable; they sound a bit muffled compared to some other headphones I own (however I'm no audiophile). Also these headphones are quite durable, as I've accidently dropped them off the side of my desk several times without any noticeable structural or cosmetic damage.

They've been my go-to headphones in most cases. I'd say they're quite good value for most people, and makes sense for casual use at home.

These are the best budget headphones I've ever used. Better than expected sound quality and bass and they don't get uncomfortable when worn for extended periods. I bought these cause I wanted something cheap but kinda decent after losing my Sony headphones. These aren't my sonys, but for $10 I'd definitely recommend these if you're on a budget.

For the price these are much better than I expected. Yes, they are made of relatively inexpensive materials, however I get really good sound from them. I only just started using them so I am unable to speak to their durability. They do fit my ears comfortably even after semi-prolonged usage. The longest I've worn them was about three plus hours. Other earphones I've had actually hurt, these my only substantive complaint is I got sweaty behind my ears, but that is not unexpected.

I got these cause I needed something affordable and a good brand to have with me for podcast recording and they do the job! The only thing I will say is that I don't see these lasting very long, the material and quality are super cheap. I feel like I am going to rip off the headphone wire and the headphones themselves are super light and flimsy. Overall, these are for temporary usage and I don't expect them to last that long. Wish they were better quality.
Nothing extremely fancy but nonetheless a great product. I use them for producing at home.

After 2.5 years, I decided to write a review for these headphones. I have a much better pair of closed-back headphones that sound much better. Compared to my more expensive Tascam headphones these sound just average. Thing is, these headphones weigh next to nothing and they are comfortable. I've been using them for more than 2 years, so the quality is good enough. I wear them off and on all day long.

The weight and the comfort are the reason I wear them. I think of them as being a good value.

These are well constructed comfortable headphones as they fit over the ear. They are sensitive and easily driven to loud volume. HOWEVER, the sound quality is wooden and muffled with no treble. Human voices are not distinct and music lifeless. Tried on several different devices, but they are not suitable for any use. Returned.

They're pretty alright, but is lacking in something audio-wise. Not sure how, but it's there. Also, my cat chewed through the cord pretty easily. Would buy again if I already had not bought a better pair.
Cuffie con un suono gradevole, abbastanza nitido.
Good quality headphone and comfortable to wear

Los audífonos suenan muy muy bien para su precio, no suenan 'lodosos', ni se distorsionan con volumen alto. Se escuchan muchísimo mejor que los audífonos bluetooth inalambricos que siempre están en alguna oferta de 299 a 249 pesos. Sí tienen bajo pero no retumba como audífonos más costosos. Lo mejor es en los medios, tienen buena claridad y definición, y por eso son excelentes para video llamadas, audiolibros, clases en linea, ver videos de youtube y demás donde escuches la voz de alguien. Si buscas algo para escuchar música y que retumbe el bass creo que no son la mejor opción, sería mejor comprar algo más encaminado a eso, con más bass y que estén más robustos. Tengo otros audífonos mejores que utilizo para escuchar música (monoprice Hi-Fi Dj style), pero para el día a día en la PC, clases en zoom, o para escuchar audiolibros uso estos todo el tiempo. Por el precio, es una calidad muy buena. Son muy ligeros y son todo de plástico, las almohadillas están chafitas, aun así, están muy bien los audifonos, son de batalla.
Non male e robuste ma la sonorità è un po confusa

I bought these based on the reviews, which said they had great sound quality. When I received them they sounded rubbish, nowhere near as good as my previous headphones, and I went to look at the reviews again to find they're actually for the SASR850, not the SASR350. SASR850s aren't even listed on UK amazon, and these are a completely different product.

Be very careful before buying!
item22.detail:

item23.name: Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth 5.3 Headphones 90 Hrs Playtime Ear buds with Wireless Charging Case Power Display Over-ear Earphones with Earhooks Waterproof Stereo Headset for Android phone Workout CAP0X0
item23.description:
1.【90 Hours Playtime & Wireless Charging】Each earbud offers up to 8 hours of continuous listening time on a single charge. When paired with the charging case, X19 Wireless Earbuds deliver a remarkable total of 90 hours of uninterrupted music playback. You have the flexibility to recharge these bluetooth headphones using the provided USB-C cable or wirelessly with any Qi-certified charging pad (charging pad not included). Moreover, the built-in dual LED power display enhances battery status visibility for both the case and headphones.
2.【Hi-Fi Stereo Audio & Crystal-clear Call】Featuring a 14.2 mm dual-chamber speaker driver unit, these bluetooth earbuds are precision-engineered to deliver crisp, balanced sound with deep bass. They provide an immersive surround sound experience that you can enjoy on the go. Additionally, the inclusion of two exclusive built-in microphones significantly enhances the performance of conference calls, ensuring that your voice comes through with clarity and volume during phone conversations. Ideal for web meetings and online classes.
3.【Designed for Sports & IPX7 Waterproof】Boasting a comfortable, ergonomic design with flexible, secure-fit ear hooks, these wireless earphones snugly and securely fit into your ears, even during vigorous exercise, preventing any unwelcome slips. With the inclusion of four pairs of rubber ear tips in various sizes (XS, S, M, L), you can enjoy a fatigue-free and painless listening experience, even if you have smaller ears. IPX7 waterproof rating guarantees protection against water droplets and sweat, making these wireless sports earbuds the perfect choice for workouts, running, and gym sessions.
4.【Bluetooth 5.3 & Auto quick Pairing】Adopting advanced wireless technology, these in-ear ear buds will automatically connect with your device quickly once taking them out from the charging case (After the first successful connection). With upgraded Bluetooth 5.3 technology, you can get a faster transfer speed and a more stable connection, sync audio and video without delay, widely compatible with most iOS/Android smartphones, TV, computer, Laptop, smart watch etc,.
5.【Independent Volume Controls & One-key Reset】Equipped with separate multi-function and volume buttons, these bluetooth headset enable you to easily control music, manage calls, and activate voice assistants. Each true wireless earbud has complete volume and track control functions, allowing you to manage all features even when using just one earbud. For added convenience, the charging case is equipped with a reset button, streamlining the reset process. Simply press and hold the reset button to instantly restore these wireless headphones to their factory settings.
reviews:
I don't write many reviews on here and I came straight here once I got these going.

First, I switched to the big ear cushions from stock as it pressed the ear buds to my ears to make a better seal. and wow.. THE BASS!

I have a Samsung phone and to me the equalizer is not so good In my opinion. So I purchased an equalizer from the Play store to have more fine tuning and this unlocked the full potential of these earbuds. (If you decide to, find an equalizer with loudness, brightness, clarity and gain control)

These sound and feel better then some of the $100 Sony buds I've had in the past.

I'd say the more expensive earbuds are better plug and play than these when it comes to sound quality. But with having the right equalizer. These blow the expensive brands out of the water! Which makes this an excellent buy for the price!

All I have is nice things to say about these ear buds.

Snug fit, low profile, fast pairing, very light, great bass and tone, no propitiatory app, great build quality and nice case.

I hope you enjoy these as much as I do!

I did not expect this to be as good as I found it to be. They come in a charging case, and it includes different sized ear buds for a custom fit. They came half charged and I used them right away. Easy to pair with Bluetooth on my phone. Clear sound. High quality, snug but comfortable fit for running. So far, so good!

Admittedly I tried to get these wireless earbuds on my ear and couldn’t. Yes I am a dufus! So I asked my generation Z son and he said figure it out yourself 🤣 So I left them on the table and wouldn’t you know the following morning, the smartest person in the house, my wife, had them on her ears and showed me how to put them on. Easy! Pairing was easy. Charging is easy. Sound is great. After years of the economical $20 wired Apple EarPods always dying within 6 months and then upgrading to the more expensive wireless $160 wireless Airpods only to see two fail within a year… I was at wits end. I hike a lot and need the music and podcasts so out of desperation I took one my kid’s older beats headphones which made me look like an old man! Alas, I scrolled Amazon and found these wireless earbuds… price seemed too good to be true but the reviews were really good. I decided to give them a try and after several days of use… decided to keep them. So far so good, and the sound is better then I expected. Two thumbs up.

The buds arrived on time and nearly 100% charged. I love that they came 4 sizes of ear tips as well as a charging cable. Several buds I've purchased in the past (sometimes for more than I did these) included neither.

I'm very pleased with the sound quality as well as the power of the bass. These babies fit perfectly while I'm working out. Highly sweat resistant and hold their position under high movement. Due to the size of the ear cuff, I would only recommend these for adults as I tried them on my 8 year old and they did fit as comfortably on her.

Over all these are a very good quality bud for the cost, and I would highly recommend them for anyone with an active or athletic lifestyle as well as those whonsimply want a comfortable ear piece to enjoy some music or a hands free call. I look forward to using these both at the gym as well as during my down time when I'm reading.

Great fit and sound! The X19 earbuds sit eell and are very secure. The sound quality is awesome both with music and calls. The microphone picks up well with only a bit of background noise. The buttons are easy to find and use.
Great sound, easy to connect, easy to use with accessible buttons, comfortable wear

These earbuds are absolutely wonderful. They are lightweight, secure, clear and easy to use. The battery life is perfect for my needs. The reviews were on point. They are so comfortable you can forget you have them on. Great product!!

Nice earbuds, good sound and volume, the battery lasts a long time for my usage, and the case has a nice battery life readout. I like the ear hooks so they don't fall out of my ears while I'm working. Definitely would recommend.
