reviews:
As someone who values a good night's sleep, I am excited to share my positive experience with the Sleep Listening to Soothing White Noise sleep mask with Bluetooth headphones. This product has been a game-changer for my sleep routine, providing unparalleled comfort and a tranquil atmosphere that has transformed my sleep quality. With its innovative features and exceptional performance, this sleep mask has become an indispensable part of my nightly routine.

The first thing that struck me about this sleep mask is its exceptional ability to block out light. The full coverage and unique design, specifically crafted for the nose area, effectively prevent any intrusive light from disturbing my sleep. This has been a remarkable solution to the problem of light disturbance, enabling me to drift off into a peaceful slumber effortlessly. Furthermore, the upgraded 3D contoured design ensures that my eyes can move freely without any pressure or discomfort.

The integration of Bluetooth 5.2 technology with eight built-in relaxing white noise sounds is where this sleep mask truly shines. By selecting the white noise mode, I am transported to a serene environment that promotes relaxation and calmness. Whether I'm in the mood for the gentle rustling of leaves or the soothing sounds of ocean waves, the variety of options cater to my personal preferences and create a conducive atmosphere for a restful sleep. The high fidelity sound produced by the Bluetooth 5.2 stereo system is truly impressive, delivering a well-closed and immersive experience for my ears.

Another standout feature of this sleep mask is its long-lasting battery life. Equipped with a 240mAh high-performance battery, it charges quickly in just around 2 hours and provides over 10 hours of playback time. This means I can enjoy uninterrupted bliss throughout the night, knowing that the sleep mask will last until morning. Additionally, the convenient timing function allows me to set it for a specific duration of 30 to 120 minutes, ensuring that the Bluetooth music doesn't disrupt my sleep once I've fallen into a deep slumber.

Maintaining hygiene is crucial, and the Sleep Mask with Soothing White Noise understands this. The sleep mask is designed to be washable, allowing me to keep it fresh and clean. With the Bluetooth module and wires easily removable, washing the mask is a breeze. This thoughtful feature not only ensures the longevity of the product but also adds to its practicality and ease of use.

The Sleep Mask with Soothing White Noise not only provides a tranquil sleep environment but also offers additional functionality. The built-in adjustable high-quality speaker and microphone allow for hands-free and clear calls, making it a convenient accessory for those who want to stay connected even while enjoying their relaxation time. The Bluetooth technology seamlessly pairs with any smartphones or tablets, making it effortless to connect and enjoy my favorite audio content.

This just works! I have been using this for a solid week now & felt compelled to leave a review.
*Fit is great, the velcro makes the headpiece 100% adjustable to your needs.
*Bluetooth pairing syncs automatically with my iPhone, no fenageling needed!
*Simply timer options - push the + button three times and you get an audio message telling you the setting you have selected
*Battery life is great - I have used it 4 nights in a row without any additional charges
*The speakers are completely removable and adjustable! This makes for easy peasy cleaning, and the adjustment is as simple as using your finger to move around the round speaker so that it is perfectly situated on your ear, or wherever you like.
*The speakers do not in any way hurt my head or ear, and I sleep on my sides.
*The volume is perfect for me, I listen to sleep hypnosis podcasts at night. I do not want or need anything to be noise canceling while I sleep, I need to have some awareness if a boogeyman is in the kitchen at 3 a.m. doing my dishes loudly.
*If you turn it on but don't use it for 5 minutes it shuts itself off, to save the battery life.
I only have one con and it doesn't bother me in the slightest, but I see where it could be annoying to someone's sleeping partner. The blinking LED light when you are using it is really bright and invasive, especially if you are sleeping near someone else's face.
Overall Fantastic purchase especially for the price, I would recommend :)
Es fácil de usar y cuando duermes es cómodo solo ajustalo cuando lo uses

I am pleasantly surprised with this !
I listen to meditation or music to fall asleep or when I wake up in the middle of the night, and using earbuds was just uncomfortable on my side. Since I listen to guided meditation, voice quality is super important and these do not disappoint! I've had earbuds that sound awful compared to this.

- The fit is good and you can adjust with the velcro strap

-The speakers are very comfortable whether I sleep on my back or side. I canot feel the speakers at all though the padding.

- The volume is great, and the quality of sound is surprising!

- The battery so far is really good; I've used it for a few nights in a row and it's still at 80% charge.

- Bluetooth pairing was instantaneous

I am super pleased with this purchase. At 24.99$ with the coupon, you CANNOT go wrong!

One of the best features of this sleep mask is its design. The 3D design allows for a comfortable fit that doesn't put any pressure on your eyes or nose. The material is breathable, which means you can wear it all night without feeling uncomfortable or sweaty. Plus, the headphones are adjustable, so you can position them in the perfect spot for your ears.
The Bluetooth connection is easy to set up and maintain, and it works well with any Bluetooth-enabled device. You can play music, podcasts, or even white noise to help you fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer. Plus, because the headphones are built-in, you won't have to worry about tangled cords or uncomfortable earbuds.
Another great feature of this sleep mask is its portability. It comes with a handy carrying case, so you can take it with you wherever you go. Whether you're traveling, camping, or just staying at a friend's house, you can easily bring your sleep mask and headphones with you for a better night's sleep.
Overall, the Bluetooth Sleep Mask with Headphones by LC-dolida is an excellent product for anyone who wants to improve their sleep quality. The comfortable, breathable design, adjustable headphones, and Bluetooth connectivity make it a must-have for anyone who struggles with falling asleep or staying asleep.

The mask was bought with the intention to listen to some soothing recordings from my Fire Kindle while falling a sleep. It did the job. The mask sat on my nose comfortably and blocked almost all the light apart of one little imperfection of the side of my nose.

I do however have notes to add: Should the mask have a timer on it to turn off after a set time, that would have been superb. The speakers can be heard by others in the room. Should they be earbuds although wired that would be more convenient and private.

On a lighter note, If I may make a suggestion and be rewarded with shares for its sale. The mask could have vivid coloured lights inside and in front of the eyes, which are electronically synchronised with the sound. Of course they will have to be controllable, on and off. They can then be used with light meditation and Yoga. An app on the phone or tablet could be designed and programmed to enable functions for the mask. I say this with a satisfied smile of a happy customer.

item76.description:
LIGHTNING AUDIO FOR iPHONE - Experience pumping sound with Thore V200 DJ Headphones - now with Lightning connectivity for iPhone (includes Apple Mfi certified cord)
ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: The premium padded ear cushions are bolstered to maximize comfort for extended studio use and improved noise isolation. The 16-point fully adjustable headband ensures users of all sizes find a well suited, comfortable fit
HD SOUND: Every v200 DJ pair is RVRB-8 digitally tuned to provide its listener with powerful and accurate sound. Extra-large, 50mm drivers paired with neodymium magnets provides wide-range frequency response for Hi-Fi caliber sound with virtually no distortion or flex.
DUAL CONNECTIVITY; (1x) 4ft Lightning iPhone cable (Apple MFI certified) - and (1x) 4ft 6.5mm aux cable. The dual wire options make this pair perfect for mastering and mixing as well as just enjoying your Pop2K Spotify playlist on your iPhone. No adapter needed!
BEYOND THE BOX > We love these DJ headphones and bet that you will too! Peace of mind comes standard with every pair - backed by a 12-month satisfaction guarantee. Reach out to our US support team to experience friendly, knowledgeable support.
reviews:
I've been using these at the gym. Plugged into my Iphone SE the sound is very good
although I do hear some background noise (it's a pretty loud commercial gym)
very comfortable and the cord is very rugged. Would definitely buy again.

I was skeptical but quickly found that these headphones provide excellent sound and are very comfortable on the ears. This is the way we listened to music back in the 1980’s and I encourage you younger folks to give wired earphones a try. The provide excellent sound and are way more comfortable to wear. Those in ear earphones get uncomfortable after wearing them for awhile and they only last about 4 to 6 hours, wired earphones never need a recharge you just want to make sure your phone is fully charged. Theses are excellent headphones and I promise you will come to love the outstanding sound they provide.
I just got these to use when I’m on the phone , iPhone 11 with the lightning port they are very comfortable and do work well for talking on the phone
For the price I think I got a good value good base, fairly good noise canceling I would buy again

For $50 I expected decent headphones and was excited that they came with the cord to use with iPhone 13. I was disappointed in the sound quality and realized I have to constantly jiggle the cord to get any sound, if I hold it just right I get the bass otherwise no bass. I have $6 headphones that are better quality.
Lightweight and not obnoxious!!!

Dear Amazon Viewers,

My prayers were answered when the thought occurred to me "do truly good bass speakers exist for lighting-cable receivers yet?"

The flexibility of the headset is more than I was expecting, way better and more useful than I at first though I would even have a use for!

The speakers can be rotated any which way you want, so I sometimes play music with the headset around my neck, speakers turned down against my chest, to stimulate my thyroid / thymus gland region with Harmonic Tones.

And yes, the bass is actually strong, and the stainless steel in the headband makes the whole headset feel even more sturdy and fits nicely with name of Thore!

♥

Rama, South West Florida

PS: if they named this headset Thore because it is strong and works with a Lightning cable... someone was really thinkn' in their branding department.

I previously purchased the iPhone Headphone Jack adapters which would work for a while and then stop working. The first two I bought were not apple brand but the third one was and none of them lasted. I saw these headphones with the iPhone cord and purchased them on January 17, 2022. I use them for walking/running. This week around June 1, 2022 the sound began to come from only one earpiece and when I jiggled the cord around it I could tell that it was because of the cord that the wires inside had probably become compromised. It did come with two cords and I will have to dig out the other cord which can connect to my computer speakers and use them with the audio jack at home, so I will give them 3 stars because the headphones work well but the cord is a problem.
Excellent purchase. I recommend these headphones.
Nice noise cancellations
good
When used with IPhone does not provide stereo sound
I almost returned it because I thought it didn’t work, you have to move the cord around so much before you get a sound when it’s connected to my phone

Yeah so I bought these…as you can guess. They are great quality headphone and I’m very happy with them! The sound is crisp and clear! HOWEVER ( yes there is a “HOWEVER” in this review ) once you listen to music/podcast/reallyanything, for a while ( and I mean a WHILE ) ya start going deaf.. pretty soon you have the volume up all the way and it sounds like a whisper when really you want peace listening to music… I’m now certified deaf and need hearing aids.. is that from old age and NOT the headphones? no I’m not actually deaf and I’m not old…

Vacationing in style with these! I’ll be bringing them on all plane rides as they come with Aux cord and the sound is so much better than using basic headphones.

This is the third pair I bought because I keep gifting it to people that come over and try them and also fall in love. Great sound and stylish!
produit tres satisfaisant je recommande son extra tout est tres bien

Es ist ein gutes Produkt. Die Kopfhörer haben einen super Klang und halt locker 10 Stunden bei voller Lautstärke durch. Nach 4-5h werden sie auf den Ohren etwas unbequem, aber es lässt sich aushalten.

Los compré para mi hija. El sonido és genial y el funcionamiento és muy fácil. A parte de ir por Bluetooth tiene cable, aunque el altavoz va integrado en el auricular y no en el cable y ésto nos ha dado problemas a la hora de utilizarlo en las vídeo conferencias y no hemos sabido como solucionar el problema.

They are very good and you cannot hear anyone. The only problem however it might not be for some that they are big.
They come in a case kool which is as big as a cross over bag. The case has a section to keep the USB changer and it is well made.
The headphones are large I would say, maybe coz my head is small? however again well made. Apart from that I am very happy with them and take them to the gym brilliant
Easy to connect to your phone and you can also plug in to your laptop or PC, that was the main reason I got them. But I did not know they would be so big and bulky so I do not travel with them to work unless I do not have much to carry coz they take up space in your bag.
But has said they are really good for the price and I am happy coz sound and cancellation is brilliant these are deal breakers for me

item78.description:
【No need to wearing earphones when doing exercise】LC-dolida bluetooth sleep headband with built in bluetooth and speakers, allows you to listen music and answer callings, no hassle to wearing additional earphones, In addition, this bluetooth headphones headband sport sleep headband protect you from being disturbed by your mess hair and sweat. Enjoy a more convenient life style.
【3 in 1 Design】Bluetooth sleeping headphones & Bluetooth Sleep Mask & Bluetooth Sports Headband 3 in 1. LC-dolida wireless headband headphones with Microphone enable to answer the call handsfree, not only Perfect for using in sports actives, it also suitable for side sleepers, this Bluetooth sleep mask effectively block out light, enables you to sleep well in any position whether at home, at office, in a hotel or on the plane.
【High Quality Bluetooth Stereo Sound with Thin Speakers】Bluetooth Headband sleeping headband with Latest Bluetooth technology provide more stable connection with your phones, tablets, laptops or pc, Only 0.25 inch Thin speaker produce High-fidelity stereo sound quality and provide soft and comfortable music environment.
【2 Hours Quick Charging, 10 Hours+ Continuous Playing】 Built-in powerful battery chip, this Bluetooth headband sleeping headphones only needs to be charged for 1~2H, the talk time/music playback time can reach 10 hours which is enough to support long time exercising like hiking, climbing. Disassemble and Washable Bluetooth Sleep Headphones music headband is more convenient to keep and clean.
【Comfortable & Stylish Bluetooth Headband】LC-dolida Stylish Pattern design sleep headphone Bluetooth sport headband is made of high quality materials. It is cool and soft, quick drying sport headband makes you feel comfortable after sweating exercise. With a strap included which help prevent from sweat drops in eyes. Good elasticity sleeping headphones suitable for various head shapes. Durable and easy to wash.
reviews: I like to sleep while flying. I like to relax waiting for my appointments. This allows me to listen to my tunes at my leisure. It doesn’t hurt your ears. I can comfortably sleep on my side without compromising the sound quality. Let’s not forget how fashionable it looks. I got the butterfly pattern. It is definitely worth the price. I am mostly likely order another one so if it needs to be cleaned, I don’t have to wait to enjoy it.

I've been using this headband for about a week. My experience has been mostly positive.

Reading the reviews, I expected the earpieces to be a little uncomfortable when laying down. While I can certainly feel them, they are very round with no pokey edges, and the fabric is comfortable, so paired with a soft pillow, I have no trouble sleeping on my side. The ear pieces are in a long pocket. if you wear the headband as it comes, the ear pieces will likely be too far back for you. This is good, I think, since it allows for different people to adjust the location of the pieces to their liking. With a little finagling, you can get the speakers in place to your liking. If you really don't want them to shift as you wear them (which has not been a bother for me) you could get out your sewing kit and add a couple stitches behind the speaker, or around it as you like.
I will say that sleeping on my back is a little annoying, as the seam hits me at the nape of the neck. This will probably be more annoying for persons with shorter hair, but even people with longer hair like me may not find this too comfortable. I get by with a little adjusting.
I don't find the front control to be uncomfortable in any way, but you can feel it being there, so be mindful of that.
The material is very soft, and is thin. I find it very comfortable. It does ride up a bit on my head with wear, even when I'm not sleeping. I find myself adjusting it back down to my ears every so often. This doesn't bother me, but it's worth noting. because it rides up, it makes my hair look really dumb. I am not likely to wear this in front of anyone I want to impress for this reason, and because of the front control panel. It is very comfortable as an eye mask when I sleep.
It falls off as I sleep in it overnight. This is not an issue for me as I only use it to go to sleep, not to stay asleep. It is easy for me to find in the morning, unlike the bluetooth corded ear buds I used to use, which I have lost.
I use this headband to listen to 20 minute stories as I go to sleep, which helps me ignore my snoring roommate. I used to have trouble falling asleep to snoring, but while I can still technically hear the snoring, I have had no such trouble since trying this product.
It charges pretty fast. I was very surprised on the first charge when it seemed to fill up in a matter of minutes. I wonder if it was pre-charged when it arrived. I have not drained the battery much, since then and I charge it every day. I don't use the audio feature all night long. I only use these headphones for 20 minute stories to go to sleep to, and sometimes to listen to Youtube videos while my roommate sleeps, which is sometimes an hour or two. The battery life has never gone as low as halfway, and usually not very low at all.
The speakers seem to work perfectly for my needs. I'm not audiophile, but I seem to hear my videos as clearly as any other headphones or through my phone's native speaker, which is all I ask.
This was the perfect solution for me.

I bought these to use while walking or at the gym. I have now added wearing them to the laundromat while washing clothes. I have also slept with them. I even wore them to Walmart to do grocery shopping.

Comfort - They are very comfortable.
Noise Cancellation - They are not noise cancelling but I want to be able to hear what is going on around me so that was a good thing. Five stars on this feature simply because it did not cancel the noise and that is what I was looking for. Five stars because I did not want noise cancelling and I got what I wanted.
Sound quality - For what I use them for the sound was fine. I listen to audiobooks/podcasts and stream movies so my only requirement is that the voices are clear. Five stars on this feature because again it worked for me.
Volume Control - The control buttons are good. There are 3 buttons and they protrude a bit. If I need to power them on and off I just feel for the center button and long press it. The up and down buttons are on either side of the power button. It is easy for me to find them by feel.
Battery - While I was using them only 2 or 3 hours a day the battery lasted multiple days before charging them. I now charge them daily due to using them to sleep (see my notes for sleep below).
Sleeping - The only thing I want to note is, if you intend to use them for sleep, make sure to keep them charged daily. The reason for this is there is a loud voice the proclaims "LOW BATTERY" and it is LOUD. Even when the speaker volume is low the voice is LOUD. Charging them every morning will prevent this from being a problem. A full charge lasts all night.
Movement - While walking around or biking I do not find that they move around much. The headband stays in place. Sometimes the speakers will shift a bit but it is just a matter of reaching up and sliding the speaker back into place. There is no need to adjust the entire band. Now sleeping is a different matter. They usually do not stay in place at night. I usually wake up in the morning with them either completely off or just around my forehead (think 80s aerobics videos). This is fine for me. I mostly use them to help me fall asleep. Also, I am a restless sleeper. I toss and turn A LOT. They may stay in place better for someone who moves around less.
Cleaning - Cleaning is easy. I do sweat a good bit when walking so they get sweaty. I remove the electronics and put them in the washer (cold water) and let them air dry. It can be a bit time consuming to put the electronics back in but it is not too bad.
Durability - I have owned this pair for over a year. I bought them June 2022 and this review is being written August 2023. In this time I have noticed no change in their function. I am, in fact, planning to buy a second pair for rotation while one pair is in laundry.

Overall rating of four stars. Deducted one star for the awkward "LOW BATTERY" notification. They are listed as "sleep" in the description but that voice could wake up light sleepers.

This is a weird review, but hopefully it can help someone as it has me. This is a great product and works for all the expected uses. But, when I had a recent asthma exacerbation and I just could NOT sleep when hearing myself wheeze, this device helped. Earplugs help when someone ELSE was making sleeping noises, snoring, etc, but only amplified my own breathing noises. Everytime I hear myself wheeze, I feel the need to reposition or cough so…no sleep for me. I tried regular earbuds but they aren’t comfortable or practical for a full night sleep. THEN, I tried this earbud headband. Very comfortable. I found a thunder/rainstorm sleep track on YouTube with noises that are similar to wheezes and rhonchi…and suddenly I lost my own breathing noises in the background noise. First good nights sleep in weeks…As I continue to get past this current illness this headband will remain my go to!
Me gusto mucho la tela que es muy suave y de buena apariencia, ademas que es super cómoda para dormir porque no molestan para nada los auriculares. Se conecta super fácil con el iphone.
Buen producto

Luego de estar tan contenta con los audífonos dejaron de funcionar. O sea peor si funcionan, dicen se conectan al tlf o tablet por el Bluetooth pero no, no es así. No transmite nada. No los he lavado ya que no los uso para ejercicio, sino para oír meditación en la noche.

Disappointed with the quality of audio sound and It is bigger in size and not fitting in my ear properly.
When I try to return it, Amazon took more than 3 days and they did not inform about neither refund or replacement, very bad service from AMAZON, now I will not buy any more with AMAZON as they have cheated me and Customer Service Representative and Manager were unfriendly when I talk over the phone.
Amazon you are misguiding and not providing the quality of service and product.

Item arrived dot on time & without any hiccups. Product found comfortable,stylish & easy to operate & clean/ wash.
Sound quality amazing & battery life satisfactory. Only few cons remain are firstly the priced ( overpriced seriously) & secondly charging port is a micro USB one even with 2022 update.

reviews: These headphones are so comfortable, the sound is great! I just ordered another pair. The sound is good,
The sound does feel slightly different than the other headphones I bought from PowerLocus but I like the extra bass feature. I also like that they are snug on my head so that’s cool too ❤️

I purchase this because me ear hurts with ear buds and I didn't want head phones with a cord. It paired so easily with my phone, but the surround sound was epic. On 2 separate occasions I spun around because I thought there was a noise behind me, but it was the headphones. When you put these on the entire world disappears. But they are far from noise canceling. Still a great purchase. Ooooh and the carrying case is fire.
they are amazing quality for the price. long lasting, the sound is good, and they look expensive. can’t recommend enough.
Suenan súper bien no molestan en las orejas un 10/10
They were good headphones but the noise cancelation was that good and the ear pad fell off within a week.
When I bend over they fall off during a squat
Ear cuff is small sound is alright but the Bluetooth sucked

Beau design
Belle qualité
Confortable et agréable
Très simple d'utilisation, il isole bien du bruit avoisinant (pratique pour les appels téléphoniques)
Ok

Sehr gutes Preis/Leistungsverhältnis. Absolut empfehlenswert. Am Klang ist für diese Preisklasse nichts auszusetzen. Jeder kann den Sound an seiner Tonquelle entsprechend seiner Hörgewohnheiten anpassen. Anmerkung: Bei meinem Kopfhörer war nach ca. 4 Monaten eine Steuertaste defekt. PowerLocus wandelte in kurzer Zeit das Gerät. Habe dann gleich den Nachfolgetyp erhalten. Also 5 Sterne!

Bought these headphones for use in the gym and on long car journeys. Found them to be super comfortable, especially in the gym when I'm doing a hike on the treadmill. Sound quality is really good, much better than I was expecting for a cheap pair of Bluetooth headphones. Really like that the product also comes with an AUX cable. Battery life has been superb so far, used them in the gym for 4 days in a row doing my hikes (1 hour long, as well as walking to and from the gym, so about 1 1/2 hours) when I first got them, and the battery life had only dropped to 90%. Have only had to charge them twice so far, both times were the night before long journeys. Very impressed with the noise cancellation as well, I can't hear the other people in the gym when I've got my music turned up a fair amount. Highly recommend these headphones.

Sinceramente non saprei cos'altro chiedere a delle cuffie. Ottima qualità sonora, comode, collegamento BT immediato, batteria di lunga durata, ottima custodia e sono anche molto belle esteticamente. Forse solo i bottoni presenti sono un po' piccolini, ma ci si abitua subito. Un ottimo acquisto, consigliate senza il minimo dubbio!

reviews: I have purchased so many versions of headphones over the past two years and have been so disappointed, some started well and then didn’t work after a while or hold a charge. Some were uncomfortable. Some had static, Some were dumb and if you went to do something like adjust volume it they would hang up on the person you were talking to… so I went into this purchase with the thought that they would last for a bit and then I’d be done. I love them!!! I can’t believe how affordable they were, they are comfortable, the sound is phenomenal. The quality and build of the product is long lasting plus the nice little storage case helps! Connecting to devices was simple and now they connect whenever I use them. Other devices I had to pair and impair to get to work,.. these know they are paired!!
These are amazing. Solid sound, great connectivity, super cute, and the price is hard to beat. In love with these headphones.

These headphones are pretty good for their price! They lasted me about a year and are pretty sturdy. They feel comfortable on your ears but the noise-cancelling is not that great. Additionally, the sound quality is decent but hollow at times. However, this is a really good steal and battery life lasts me about 4-5 days when using them about 2 hrs a day.

I purchased these about six months ago for my fifteen year old daughter. This is the first accessory she has had this long without damage. She takes then everywhere. She loves that they still work with a cord if the battery dies. I love that they fold because she had snapped several others I've purchased. They have a case as well, nice feature.
She loves the sound and the charge time is remarkable.
Very pleased with these and the price tag.

I purchased these for long haul flights - earbuds will give me a headache with extended use. These worked very well. It doesn't use the battery to plug them in (no need to even turn them on). I like that you can plug them in, as well as pair with a different device (like your phone). Worked perfectly for my flight.

They work pretty good and sound quality seems pretty good. The only thing I dislike is there is an odd noise when no music is playing. It's pretty quiet but I notice it and it's annoying. I won't return them though because otherwise they work good and were very affordable.

So I've been using these headphones for over a month now, and what I did notice about it is that with bluetooth audio is delayed, but with the jack cord it is not, now i don't mind it when it comes to music, because i'm not worried about the timing of it. Overall i really like them, comfortable fit, good sound quality, long lasting battery life, high bass. (which i like in my music) So give this one a try to see if it exceeds your expectations. Have a wonderful day :)
They work well, quality hearing too. Purple always a plus.

I've had these since last November (2022), and they're almost a year old at this point. They're still going strong, sound's really good and the battery life is pretty good as well. No complaints here and when I ordered them last year, the shipping was pretty good, semi-fast and I've been using them since.

I listen to a lot of music and game a lot, and these headphones haven't disappointed. Noise cancellation isn't the BEST but, that's the only mild complaint I have.

Fáciles de usar y conectar. La calidad del sonido es buena; el volumen mínimo ya es más que suficiente, no he probado el resto pero es que ya me basta. Solo llevo una carga de batería y me parece increíble lo que está durando. Además lo de que tengan radio es un punto extra que nunca está de menos. La única pega que podría sacar es el sonido que hacen cuando están conectados y no se reproduce nada, pero ya ves tú que problema. Ahora que duren. En general muy contenta con la compra.

The headphones are brilliant and very comfortable to wear they are easy to use easy to fold up and put in your bag the quality is brilliant as well the sound is good and you cannot hear any back no background noise the padding around the headphones of very comfortable indeed I would recommend these for the first time if you want Bluetooth quality it ticks all my boxes they are great and very affordable best headphones I've ever had

I needed headphones for working and watching videos on my laptop in the evenings. So as not to disturb the family with sounds. Quite decent headphones for their price. Pairing is instant, the connection is stable. The headphones are lightweight, absorb external noise well. They support a second pairing with the phone, and are easy to switch. The presence of the case is very nice. The power button is good. The function switch buttons are very inconvenient. But the connection in the nodes for folding the headphones seems fragile. That's why I use them at home and try not to fold them often. Delivery is fast and free. This is not so important, but the packaging was missing the branded black box.

Léger et confortable même avec des lunettes.
Tient bien sur la tête.
Connection en Bluetooth ou câble.
Port de charge.
Simple d'utilisation. Boutons sur Le côté du casque pour gérer le volume et le changement de musique, l'éteindre et l'allumer.
Livré avec une pochette de transport.
Design joli et épuré.
Charge rapide et tiens longtemps. Je le charge une fois et je peux faire environ 5 séances de sport d'environ 1h30 sans avoir à le recharger.
Son de qualité.

Le seul bémol:

Quelques légers saut de musique de temps en temps. Mais pas dérangeant.

Rapport qualité/prix excellent

reviews:
I just got these, so this is just an initial review for now. If anything changes, I will update after some use.

I am pretty "behind the times" on most technology, so these are my first bluetooth headphones/ear buds despite the fact that none of my devices have been compatable with corded headphones for a long time - if I'm in a place where I can't play audio directly out of the device, I usually just don't. All of this to give context that I am not necessarily hugely picky about the small details - I just need something that would let me listen to music or movies when I fly. I wasn't sure what to expect from the price, but so far I really like them!

Pros:
- Clear sound quality! I read lots of reviews that the bass was a little much, but I don't think it's bad. There is a button on the left ear that you can use to change the sound settings, so if the default setting isn't good for you, see if one of the other 5 settings works better!
- Easy set up
- Stays put on your head. I put these on and did a quick yoga flow with a few down dogs and it barely budged. If you need these for some kind of physical activity, it seems like they aren't going to be needing constant readjustment.
- Decently noise canceling. While you can still hear a bit of what is going on around you, these seem to do a decent job of limiting extraneous sound. And they do a great job of containing the media sound withing the headphone - I put them in my lap and played music and couldn't hear it! No need to worry about bothering someone next to you.
- Easy to adjust length
-Decently comfortable. I tend to have pretty sensitive ears when it comes to headphones/earbuds, so not immediately feeling like my ears are being smashed is important to me. I will update after I have had an opportunity to wear them for a long time (1+ hour) but I've had them on for about 30 minutes and still feel comfortable with them on which is a good sign.

Cons:
- The plastic exterior just felt a bit low quality to me at first. When I pulled them out of the box I wasn't sure how well they would work because they just felt kind of cheap. They're really pretty though, and lightweight, so I don't really think this is a big deal, especially given the price!!
- The joints where the ear pieces can fold in to compact just feel a bit stiff, and I am a little concerned about how many times I'll be able to fold/unfold them before something breaks. For now there aren't any issues, but I'm keeping my eye on it.
- It's kind of tricky to control the volume on the actual headset. I have sensitive hearing so I have only been using the lowest possible volume setting and it is plenty, but if I need to toggle up or down it's definitely easier to do on my device. The press and hold system on the ear piece doesn't allow for as much control in the margin of increase/decrease in volume. Not a huge issue, but an area that could use improvement for sure.

I've been looking for a good pair of wireless headphones on a budget price ever since Apple decided to remove the 3.5mm jack from their phones, with every phone company following suit. So now I'm forced to listen to wireless products. However, the cool thing about these headphones is it CAN be wired, which I love.

The sound quality is amazing for the price. It blows my wireless earbuds out of the water in terms out sound, from vocal clarity to bass to every little sound that goes into the song. They can get quite loud and powerful. The noise cancelation also seems to work quite well.

I've been wearing these pretty much non-stop since they arrived. They're pretty light but also decently durable for the price, so you really can't tell you've got them on. The battery life is amazing I can wear them for ages without charging, I think I've only charged them once in the past few days since they arrived.

Another really cool feature is the buttons on side, power on/off, volume up/down, some sort of EQ mode button that allows you to switch between different pre-sets to make specific music you're listening to feel deeper, and you start to notice more sounds.

Don't get me wrong, there's probably way better wireless headphones in the market, but for this price (I paid $19.28) they are absolutely amazing and I might pick up a few more pairs in case one ever breaks for some reason.

If you're reading this review and still hesitating snagging a pair of these and they're in the $20ish range. Snag 'em up. They're fantastic and I'm very pleased with the quality, comfort, and durability of these wireless headphones for the price.

Side notes: It also has an FM feature which I haven't tested much, but that's unique and cool. Useful if you enjoy listening to certain radio shows. The microphone for phone calls seems to be quality, and of course I can hear the calls crystal clear.

I'm sure I'm missing a few things, but overall I'd rate these a 10/10 based off all the factors I listed above. Give them a try you won't be disappointed!

P.S. I LOVE the gold and black color. It looks incredible. Buy these. They're awesome. You're welcome, now go enjoy some tunes.

I bought these last April 2022. They recently broke because I took them off my head at a weird angle and so they broke. Even though they broke it still functions. Prior to that I had dropped them plenty of times over the year I had them and they did not break. So, they're durable. I was able to tape it together but I'll need to get a new one regardless because it doesn't fit on my head the same. The sound quality is good for headphones that are $20. However, the mic quality is absolute shit, so make sure you have an external microphone you can use. The volume controls are decent but I typically set my volumes using my PC settings. I've used them for work from home, meetings, and even for playing games. The battery life is good too and they work while plugged in and charging. I also like that they'll automatically shut off when not in use. Overall, definitely good for the price. I'd recommend it.

OMG I CANT SAY ENOUGH ABOUT THESE!! THEY ARE LOUD, NOISE CANCELLING, THEY CONNECT QUICKLY AND THE BATTERY LIFE IS CRAZY!! I WILL BE BUYING MORE OF THESE!! THEY ARE JUST AS GOOD AS BEATS!! GREAT FOR WORKING OUT, LISTENING TO AUDIO BOOKS AND PODCAST. GET SOME!!! THEY CHARGE FAST, C TYPE CHARGER AND THEY COME WITH A 3MM JACK FOR PLUGGING DIRECTLY INTO YOUR PHONE IF YOU NEED TO. JUST THE PERFECT PAIR AND AFFORDABLE.

I really like these headphones. They are light, wireless, and easy to use. You can pause your music, adjust volume and skip via the headset itself. Very good buy if your looking for a headset to use when doing chores and stuff.

item82.name: AUSDOM E7 Bluetooth Noise Cancelling Headphones: Wireless Over Ear ANC Headphones with Microphone, 50H Playtime, Hi-Fi Stereo Sound, Deep Bass, Comfortable Protein Earpads for Travel Work Home Office
item82.description:
Digital Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) Technology: Advanced ANC technology Utilizes sophisticated algorithms to analyze incoming sound signals and generate a precise "anti-noise" signal that effectively neutralizes unwanted ambient noise. This cutting-edge technology can filter out as much as 92% of surrounding noise, whether it be from airplanes, subways, cars, or crowds, resulting in a more refined and immersive audio experience (Note: Power ON, ANC ON.)
Superior Immersive Hi-Fi Audio: Equipped with 40mm large-aperture drivers and advanced audio signal processing technology, this wireless bluetooth headphone delivers peerless Hi-Fi audio sound without any interruptions. With a built-in microphone, this over ear headphones captures even the most subtle details of sound, ensuring that you never miss a beat. Get ready to enjoy the best sound performance with the AUSDOM E7 active noise cancelling headphones
50-Hour Playtime with USB-C Quick Charge: With a built-in 1000mAh Battery, AUSDOM E7 sound cancelling headphones provide up to 35 hours of music playback in noise-canceling mode. In standard mode, the headphones can last for an impressive 50 hours. even if you're in a hurry, a quick 5-minute charge is enough to give you an additional 2 hours of listening time.No need to worry about your wireless headphones powering off mid-flight/mid-trip
Multipoint Connectivity with Bluetooth Technology: With Bluetooth technology, you can experience faster transmission speeds and enjoy a seamless, low-latency listening experience. You can easily connect to 2 Bluetooth devices simultaneously, allowing you to effortlessly switch between calls, video conferencing and music. This USB-C Bluetooth headphone is compatible with cellphones, laptops, tablets, desktops and all devices with Bluetooth enabled or a 3.5mm audio Jack
Comfortable Over the Ear Design: Featured with natural protein earpads, you will be able to experience a marshmallow-like softness texture on the headband and ear cushions. The ergonomic over-ear design and durable 90° rotating earcups are tailored to fit the average head shape, and they can be easily adjusted to your preferred fit, ensuring all-day comfort. The lightweight build also ensures this noise cancelling headphones is comfortable for long listening sessions
reviews: These are nice headphones if you want something a bit more noise cancelling and something you can take on the go. It is good headphones for a budget. These are great to travel with. Compared to many other wireless headphone, these are over the ear headphones. The headphone does have a microphone built in. It does come with both Bluetooth and aux connection if you want to do it that way. That being said they can work for laptop, tablets, desktops, and phones given they have Bluetooth capability or 3.5 headphone jack. The headphones are fairly decent size. They are not extremely heavy so it is great to walk with. There is a simple bag carrying case with a pull string to close the bag. You can control the sound and such on the actual device or your phone. There are LED light indicators to show charging as well. From what I can tell, you can use an aux port even with the device's battery is dead. It utilizes a PU leather and foam for the ear cushions. With this material, you can expect the material as some irritation to your skin if you sweat. For best cleaning, I would just wipe it down with a damp towel or an alcohol wipe. It is a simple press button. It does utilize type c charging which is nice. I do not think it can connect it wired to use the headphone The type c cable provided is pretty long. The headphone fits nicely and comfort. It does take a few uses to break in the leather material and be comfortable putting these headphones on. Like a pair of shoes, you have got to break the headphones in for they are easier to fit on your head. The head piece can also be adjusted on the ends. One thing to note about this is that it does get warm to wear this during hot days. It can rub against your skin if you happen to sweat. It can cause irritation. It does not pinch too much on my ears so it will not crush my ear into my glasses which is nice. It uses the USB cable charging purposes. The sound quality is really good as well I am able to use this headphones with my VR headset and the sound is amazing. It feels like I am sitting in the room as it has surround sound. All controls for these headphones on the left side. You can mute/unmute. The microphone definitely picks up my voice very easily and clearly. It blocks out a good amount of surrounding noise for something without a wind guard. The device is also very easy to adjust in my opinion to make it definitely feel very comfortable. The black and red color is nice. I would say if you can just to wipe it down with those lint catchers to get rid of hair and just wipes with an alcohol after use. It is very easily fitting to any head with the adjustment. There is no dongle so you need to connect this via bluetooth or you can use aux cable. Overall these are inexpensive headphones that are good quality for the budget. The sound is good and it has the basic features many other headphones of this size haven. It does make gaming on your phone an experience though which is great. I do like that you can use both aux and bluetooth.

We wanted wireless headphones for our travel needs. This headphone does the job very well. Not the best-sounding ones as high-end headphones but good enough at this price point. Overall it has a good capability & we (My wife & I) are satisfied with it for the price factor. I would recommend it.

My 2 cents below:

Pros:
- Sound is good & clear enough. Seals the ear well & noise-canceling features work nicely. I like the bass in these too
- Microphone works great in office calls & no one has complained yet who listens to me on those calls
- Comfortable to wear & use these even for long periods of time. The padding is soft & headband/earmuffs are adjustable too
- 50 hours of playback time is the above market standard for similar headphones
- The controls on the headphones are easy to get used to it
- Design is classy & modern looking
- Build quality is very good overall & feels durable
- They bundled a carry bag in the package
- Reasonably priced when compared to the competitive options available

Cons:
- It is not the best-sounding headphones as high-end Sony or Bose etc but it's not fair to compare it with those high-end headphones too

Used these on the plane for a few hours at a time for each connecting flight. They sit comfortably on my large head, due to the soft pads all around and the adjustable length of the ear cups. I was able to use them both wired through the plane’s entertainment system and wirelessly with my iPhone X. Both methods work well and did not vary in sound quality that I could notice. Overall sound quality is decent considering the price bracket these fall into. Yes, there are better but more expensive headphones. But these hit a sweet spot of price, comfort and satisfying sound quality. These ANC8 don’t have too much bass, so some heavy bass songs do distort a bit at high volume. The overall sound quality is fairly good and crisp. Although worth the price, these can’t compete head to head with models that are priced twice as much or more.

The multi-function buttons work well. They are large and easy to find and control while the headphones are on my head. Power, Volume, Track and Noise Cancellation are all a press away. The Bluetooth pairing to my iPhone X was simple following the included instructions. There are different color LEDs indicating if the headphones are on and/or connected to BT. I like that the volume on these adjusts both on the headphones and on my iPhone at the same time. Some devices have separate adjustment levels which can be annoying. I also like that the battery level / indicator (for the headphones) is displayed on my phone. The noise cancellation works fairly well. Again, it doesn’t stack up to the “known” expensive units (yes, I’ve tried a few), but these do perform well enough for their price bracket. On the plane they did help me sleep and reduced the annoying loud engine hum, so I’m glad I took these with me. I charged these at my destination only to top them off. But there was no indication of battery shortage during my 9+ hours of use each way.

These ANC8 headphones came with a rigid black zip-up carry case and two cables. One 62” audio cable and the other 34” micro USB for charging. The included manual is simple, detailed and translated to a few languages. Overall, these are decent Noise Cancelling headphones that are worth the sixty buck$.

Got these as a second pair for workout. Loved the color and design and fits perfectly. The sound is great and makes working out enjoyable. The best part is that I used them after 7 days without charging and they still work. I was convinced it would need charging but I was surprised it worked fine. Totally worth the cost!
Good sound not a lot of bass tbh ear muffs are a little small and the sound canceling doesn’t work
Great product, worth the price.

Decent sound and better quality bass......
Noise cancellation also superb....
6 weeks into owning these the war cover fell off and cannot be attached

item83.name: Lavince Sleep Headphones Bluetooth Sports Headband, Wireless Sports Headband Headphones with Ultra-Thin HD Stereo Speakers Perfect for Workout,Jogging,Yoga,Insomnia,Side Sleepers,Air Travel,Meditation
item83.description:
【Sleep Headphones & Sleep Mask & Sports Headband 3 in 1】 Lavince Bluetooth Headband allows you to listen music without having to wear additional headphones, and protect you from being disturbed by your mess hair and sweat. Built-in microphone to let you won't miss any callings. Perfect suitable for gym, workout, running, yoga and other outdoor activities.Even if you don't use the music, the eye cover is comfortable enough to sleep in any position.
【Bluetooth wireless technology version 5.0 and longer battery life】-The wireless headband supports Bluetooth pairing between smartphones and tablet devices, making it faster and more convenient. The wireless range is 45 feet, the charging time is 2 hours, it can provide up to 10 hours of music playback or 12 hours of talk. Very suitable for exercise or sleep. USB-C cable included.
【Super soft and breathable headband】Lavince Bluetooth headband sleep earphones are extremely soft and lightweight, provide breathable mesh lining, support easy stretching to fit all head shapes, also have excellent softness and hypoallergenicity, and prevent the head Sweat enough to support wearing to sleep, so the shading function is very useful.
【 Designed for Sports Lovers & Music Sleeper】Sweat-absorbing inner fabric touches smooth and great for sports and falling in sleep.The ultra-thin flat headphone speakers are comfortable for lying down or sleeping on your side, won’t press the ears.
【Bluetooth Stereo Sound with Thin Speakers】Thickness is only 0.25 inch speaker, which is very comfortable for sleepers. True HD HIFI sound featuring latest Bluetooth technology that produce great sound quality, bluetooth can pair your iPhone X/ iPhone 7/ iPhone 8/ iPhone 6 or any other Smartphones iPad Tablets easily.Compatible with Android and Ios. It is the gift for family or friends on travel and airplane in Festivals.
reviews: The pliable and supple material wraps around the wearer's head in a gentle manner, resulting in a secure and comfortable fit that lasts throughout the night. It reduces the pain that is caused by standard headphones and earbuds, which may generate pressure points and make it difficult to sleep on one's side. Those individuals who like sleeping on their side while listening to their preferred music or other audio material will find that this headband is a game-changer. These headphones for sleeping deliver an impressively high-quality sound experience overall. The speakers that are built into the headband provide sound that is both clear and well-balanced, which enables me to listen to my preferred music, audiobooks, or podcasts with an amazing level of clarity. The positioning of the speakers has been carefully thought out to match the ears, which will provide the listener with the best possible audio experience without creating any pain or getting in the way. This Bluetooth headband, in addition to having a design that is conducive to restful sleep and music capabilities, also functions as a solution to lessen the disruptions caused by snoring. It helps conceal the sounds of snoring and creates a tranquil sleeping environment for both the user and their spouse by playing calming music or white noise via the headband. My sleep has been substantially less disrupted as a result of snoring thanks to this function, which has been a game-changer for me.

I appreciate the comfortable headband and although I turn it off and on and replay from the band, I mostly control the volume from my telephone. Overall, I love it. One issue I do have is the packaging label. My first box stated it was only for sleep. I reordered a second one and the box stated it was for sleep and sport. I ordered a third one as a gift for a sports coach and when it came the box said it was just for sleep. So which is it? Can it be used for both? How do I make sure I get the one for Sport because that is what I really want it for. It was an Amazon purchase.

These sleep headphones have transformed my bedtime routine. They're ultra-comfortable, with flat speakers embedded in a soft headband, ensuring a peaceful night's sleep. The sound quality is excellent, and the Bluetooth connectivity is convenient. The only minor drawback is they can get warm during extended use. If you enjoy falling asleep to music, these headphones are a game-changer for a restful night's sleep.

Comfortable, soft, headphones have good sound & great volume control. Easy to pair w/ my phone.
Blocks out sounds & light if I pull them down over my eyes.
Looks good too.

A headband with great qualities held back by terrible design choices. As we enter into the age of artificial intelligence, part of me feels a really smart robot was given a description of what a good sleep headband should have and made it, but no humans QA tested it.

______
PROS:
- Great sound for coin-sized speakers. For years, I used normal-sized headphones to help me sleep. I see some people are complaining about the size and/or shape of these speakers, but my seasoned ears found them acceptable. At least until the technology improves, however it does.

- Easy enough Bluetooth connection. Took me a moment, but I'm not sure if the initial instructions were vague or it was my user error, but now that I know, the headphones readily and easily connect to my smartphone.

- Breathable fabric. I am neither the most or least sweaty person, and my skin feels fine under the headband.
______
CONS:
- Terrible, terrible, terrible volume control. The "-" and "+" buttons on the headband have two functions: track/playlist navigation by *tapping* either button, and controlling the volume by *holding* either button. All that would need to be done is switch these input functionalities around, so that holding a button switches tracks (after which it waits for you to release and hold again, as you will need a second regardless to hear what track you're on), and tapping it changes volume. A design flaw made much worse by:

- There's a horribly loud and painful beep after you set either the headband or connected device to max volume, and I do mean LOUD. Not loud because everything else it's quiet, it's LOUD. Such a design could only mean that the software in my specific item is horribly bugged, or no one actually tested or cared about this terrible feature in the software (or something else that I hope their software engineer could explain to me). Normally, you shouldn't be listening to headphones at max volume, but if you lose the game of trying to turn up the volume of quiet music by holding down the button and accidentally and unwantingly setting it to max volume, you'll be punished with most unpleasant screech in your ears.

- Flashing lights? At one point, the red and blue lights on front that normally dictate the headband connecting flashed without stopping, lighting up the dark room. I ended up ditching them and using my old, standard-sized, uncomfortable headphones I was looking to replace with this product. After recharging/turning them on-and-off again, the lights stopped. However, the battery was at 80% power when the lights started, so I'm not sure what the issue was.
_______________
SMALLER CONS:
- I see some people have been complaining about the "Connected" voice. Specifically for me, it's not been an issue as I connect my headband before I put it on, but I can see why that it a bad design choice if your device turns on or off automatically.

- While the headband is light and small, the buttons have a bad habit of being pressed if you like to sleep on your side/downward. More of an issue with buttons and people in bed, and I wouldn't point to this as a deal-breaker. HOWEVER, considering holding down "+" increases volume, expect to be woken up by that loud beep if you lean too far on your left side, or if it falls off your head and you roll onto it as it has with me.

- The positions of the speakers can be adjusted slightly to fit where my ears are. However, the band itself is somewhat awkwardly shaped. There isn't really a position for the band itself to rest on the forehead without the speakers completely missing the ears. So, you have to wear it more on your brow. While I get these could double to cover your eyes, they don't cover my eyes comfortably either. While I wouldn't say they torture you, this will be a headband that you will be aware that you are wearing.

- No noise cancellation. (Didn't buy it for, nor expected it to block noise. Just feels misleading to market it as such.)

_____________
Overall, I'd rate this three stars. Not three stars of a mediocre product, but a product of laughably bad design that I begrudgingly use for certain good qualities. I will only use this for as long as until I can find a better headband that was actually quality assured, which I hope will be soon. I need some sleep.

I bought this item because I enjoy listening to podcasts before I fall asleep. As a side sleeper, using my AirPods was uncomfortable—they'd press against my eardrum. But these headphones are different. The moment I put them on, I noticed how soft and stretchy the headband felt. It's like a workout headband, but with padded earphones inside. Surprisingly, the audio is loud and crystal clear. Initially, I even thought the sound was still coming from my phone! It was a pleasant surprise. Overall, I'm really pleased with this purchase, especially considering the price. I'd recommend these to anyone interested in a comfortable pair of headphones for sleeping!

This is a neat little gadget. Soft material and covers the head pretty good. The volume isn’t crazy loud but loud enough to not disturb others. I don’t know if I would wear it to sleep but it would be great as earmuffs or if you are a jogger and want to listen to music. Pretty happy with it
Love this, use it when I am walking outside to listen to music. Tried to use overnight but was too hot for me.

UPDATE sept 2023: 4 months later, I'm disappointed. One of the headphones stopped working 2 days ago... Deceiving, I really liked them. I'll find a more eco-friendly with better quality model that will last.

INITIAL REVIEW: I really like this product. The handband is made of breathable material and I really don't feel the earphones even when sleeping on my side. I was worried it wouldn't fit, because my head circumference is small (54cm) but it fits great. It stays in place until i fall asleep, butwhen I wake up it's not on my head anymore, but it is perfect. Easy to connect to my phone and it can also be used for calls. Great purchase.
Me encanto para dormir y escuchar música relajante muy cómodo no molesta nada

I work in a hectic environment. Sometimes it can feel overwhelming. These headphones can help to buffer all the background noise so that I can focus on the person in front of me. I can move the actual headphones within the band, so that they're not actually on my ears which is helpful when I'm buffering sound but need to hear.

I have on a couple of occasions forgotten to turn them off, and they were still playing after work. So I can attest to a play life of 8-9 hours at least on my set lol.

I bought 2pair, and accidentally washed one. It worked for a day or two before it just wouldn't turn on. I was surprised I got that out of it.

I have recommended this product to others, and will continue to do so.

reviews: Superior sound quality with sleek, stylish design. Battery life is very good.

Hands down, these headphones are truly the best, unbelievable sound quality that you can control on the app with sound setting starts between warm to energetic, very comfortable on the ears and long lasting enjoyment and battery

I’m not an audiophile. My AirPods stopped working so I decided I wanted to try on-ear noise canceling headphones with a long battery life. My primary intention is to use them for work calls.

I ordered the Bose QC45, very happy with them (I should also mention I was happy with the sound from my basic AirPods before). Except I couldn’t wear them for longer than an hour because my ears would start profusely sweating??? I googled this and turns out it’s a thing! Some people get hot ears from the synthetic material of the ear cups.

The main reason I ordered these was because of the leather ear cups. It worked! No more sweaty ears. My ears are bigger than the round part, maybe that’s why, but I still find them very comfortable. Given the “lack of seal” I find the ANC to be fine for my needs.

One thing I find annoying is that to put them back in their case, you have to slide the sides back in. They slide smoothly and aren’t notched. So basically, every time I take them out of the case I have to readjust them when I put them on, and since they’re not notched as you slide the sides out I find myself readjusting a few times.

The other thing - I was getting frustrated connecting these to my windows work laptop for video calls, but then I remembered there’s an audio jack in the case so now I just use that with no issues. I don’t think they automatically connect to my iPhone like the Bose ones did, but that may be user error. It doesn’t seem like you can easily go between devices like I can with my AirPods from iPhone to MacBook. I didn’t find the app to be intuitive for this either. Hopefully I’ll eventually figure it out.

Lastly, I did find that these needed to be broken in - I didn’t know that was a thing, the Bose ones didn’t. Right out of the box, music sounded like it did with my AirPods. I played with the settings, etc. For my needs I didn’t really care, I just wanted my ears to stop sweating. Then one day I was listening to music and the sound was much more impressive.

I ordered the sand color, but in hindsight I wish I had gotten black. The case is light grey for these and I’m concerned about staining over time if I’m not super careful. Subjective, but I think black would probably also look more sophisticated on video calls. Overall I’m very happy with these!

The good: They sound great, very crisp sound without too much bass. They're also pretty comfortable, but if you're moving around, say cleaning your house or something, they will fall off your head. Also, great battery life.

The bad:
1. HORRIBLE Bluetooth handling. Once you pair them to two devices, even if you're nowhere near the second device, upon turning them on, expect a few minutes of glitchy audio getting constantly cut, until it becomes okay. The only remedy to this is to factory reset the headphones and not pair them with more than one device. Again, this happens even nowhere near the second device.

2. Iffy touch interface. I still can't reliably skip or pause with the touch interface. Volume is a bit more reliable and has a nice gesture to it.

3. Pretty mediocre to sub par NC. Really unimpressive compared to Sony or Bose.

In short, I would never buy these knowing what I know now, especially for such a high price.

Recently purchased both the Bang & Olufsen HX headphones and the Bose NC 700 headphones for comparison. My biggest must haves in over the ear headphones are sound quality, call quality and comfort.

Call quality
The B&O HX’s call quality is not up to par with Bose. While on a phone call walking outdoors wearing the B&O HX’s, the person on the other end of the call said the background noise was deafening and they could not hear me over the noise (city traffic and wind). I switched to the Bose while on the same call and it was worlds better, lowered background noise, and they could hear me much clearer. Bose won this test!

Sound Quality
The sound quality of the B&O HX’s was good, however the sound quality depreciates when I switch over to noice canceling. Throughout all modes and different genres of music I noticed the bass is lacking and they focus more on the lyrics and spoken words rather than the music and lyrics. The Bose however blew me out of the water with sound quality, excellent bass, great clarity, and better EQ controls to customize to your liking. Bose wins here as well.

Comfort
The B&O HX’s are comfortable headphones with amazing build quality. However the earpiece shape is more round than the Bose and did get uncomfortable after about an hour of use. I also found they struggle to stay planted on my head when I’m moving around quickly (not ideal for running or working out). The Bose however have a silicone lining on the upper arm and stay put on my head when running. Bose also won here!

Overall the B&O HX’s are good headphones with excellent features and build quality but at $500 and compared to the Bose NC 700 headphones at $300 I could not justify the higher price tag. I need over the ear headphones to be a device I can use at work to take phone calls and video meetings, at the gym, on an outdoor walk, and on a plane. I feel as though the Bose are the better buy but glad I compared both to find the front runner!

I did truly love these headphones. I'm a fan of the aesthetics and sound. I've tried many headphones, looking for the ones that play music to my ears. I did return these though due to my ears not fitting completely under the ear pad. No discomfort, even after hours of listening but found it to be troublesome with creating a good seal. Another note, there is circular engraving in the ear cups. There are also earcup commands by swiping on them. The engraving can be quite annoying when trying to skip songs due to your finger naturally wanting to follow the engraving.

Still overall great headphones. Can't comment on noise cancelling as it's not really a feature I pay attention to. Isnt the whole point of it to not pay attention? Cant be bad then.
Great sound from these
Design and sound are phenomenal. I was lucky to buy it during promotion.

While it may not be the industry leader in terms of noise cancellation, these headphones performed well in a noisy airplane where I typically use such headphones.

Were they better than Sony WH-1000XM5? Maybe? Maybe not? I understand that "data doesn't lie"... but personally, I didn't care much about this - it's not as noticeable to me anyway.

What IS noticeable though is a vast difference in the quality of materials and the overall build of these headphones versus the Sony WH-1000XM5 (which I also own).

I suppose one complaint I have is that the touch controls don't work so well for me. Start/stop are completely fine, but next/previous and volume controls are not as responsive. Could be just practice, but must be mentioned.

All in all, as noise cancelling headphones, they do the job just fine for me. The reason I love these headphones is GREAT sound and the build quality where I can actually tangibly appreciate the premium quality of this piece of equipment.
Calidad premium en materiales y audio. Altamente recomendables.

Me encantaron son extremadamente cómodos las almohadillas son de piel real lo que los hacen muy frescos y no sudas, los micrófonos son muy claros para llamadas y videoconferencia. El sonido con y sin la cancelación de ruido es espectacular.

Comparados con otros audífonos del segmento en el rango de 400 a 500 dólares estos son la mejor opción en calidad, desempeño, tecnología y diseño.
Revise los sony wh-1000xm5, jabra elite 85h, sennheiser momentum 4, bose quietcomfort 45 y los Bose Noise Canceling 700. Y estos fueron los que más me gustaron, todos los anteriores tienen almohadillas sintéticas y aún que son cómodos al inicio terminas sudando mucho y después de un año dependiendo del uso pueden pelarse o descarapelárse.
