item87.name: Skullcandy Crusher ANC 2 Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones with Sensory Bass, 50 Hr Battery, Skull-iQ, Alexa Enabled, Microphone, Works with Bluetooth Devices - Black
item87.description:
What is Crusher Tech? Boost your bass with the sensory bass slider, mellow out or go all in skull crushing! Crusher Tech enhances your iPhone, Android or Computer audio experience.
Custom Sound- The Crusher analyzes your hearing and produces sound specifically for YOU. You'll do a quick test and the Crusher will be tuned to you. We have introduced a new level of comfort to the Crusher range and created our most comfortable headphone
Epic Noise Cancelling - The Crusher ANC 2 has 4 microphones listening to all outside noise to actively mute the outside world. You can also adjust the noise cancellation level between mute, hearing and between.
50 Hour Battery - Skullcandy's biggest battery, get up to 50 hours on a single charge and if you do run out of charge a 10 minute charge will give you 4 hours. Plus, use the preset modes to customize your audio depending on what you're listening to.
Multipoint Pairing - Allows you to pair your headphones to two different devices at once. Connections are managed automatically. If you get a call while watching a movie on your laptop, your connection will switch to the call on your phone like magic.
Buy with Confidence - 1 year US warranty included.
reviews:
I've had every version of the crusher series and these are the ones I have Benn waiting for. All the previous versions focused way too much on the bass drivers and ignored sound quality and volume output, but the ANC 2's have checked every box this time around.

Sound Output - They are so loud! In the past it seemed as if skullcandy was trying to protect our ears for us but not anymore, blast them at your own risk.

Sound Quality - The sound quality is great for all genres but to achieve it, you will need to use the in app 5 band EQ. I personally max out the highs and mid-highs, 2 notches of mids above 50% and the rest leveled.

Crusher Bass - No headphones can compete with the bass.

Skull IQ app - Most headphone app seems rushed and not well put together. Skull IQ is polished, easy to use and surprisingly well put together. It also brings more features to the headsets than you thought was necessary.

Comfort and Esthetics - These headsets are a full soft-plastic build, so it is very light but still feels robust. Ear cushions are soft and completely covers your ears (could be sweat resistant). Overall look is sleek and classy.

I highly recommend these headphones to anyone besides audiophiles. It is definitely worth the price, only time can tell the durability of these sets but for sure you will want to music/movies more often and even ads are fun to watch.

As a bonus, I am a DJ, and if you are the type of dj that listens to speaker reviews on YouTube. You can actually hear the different audio quality, especially in the bass.

Was in need of a new set headphones and after doing my searching I came across these online after seeing such positive feedback I was very interested in them. The bass is next level literally feel like there’s subwoofers behind me when I listen to music. The ANC isn’t the best out there but with the bass an a bit of volume you won’t hear anything anyways ( trust me ). The ability to change every buttons actions is so convenient as well great battery life. Fast charging. Great build soft touch plastic and the ear cups are nice and soft. If anyone is in the market for a good set of headphones with bass ( real bass ) these are the ones. Everyone who I let try them out instantly smiles and laughs away because they can’t believe what they were feeling as the bass shakes/vibrates their head. The Skullcandy iQ is great as well and so easy to use. Haven’t had Skullcandy products in a long time so I was kinda anxious trying them out but I’m so happy I did ! They sound great they look great I couldn’t ask for more and the price is also not bad at all. I don’t leave reviews but I just had to

I bought these headphones for the bass, already aware that the noise cancelling would be bad. Its honestly better than i expected but i defenitly wouldn't say its even good. The anc doesnt really work at all. It works better when its off, if that says anything. That said, the bass i defenitly worth the price, and the sound quality is amazing! Defenitly a good purchse, if you can get by the whole "anc is a waste of money" thing lmao

I'm a mix between a basshead and an audiophile. I installed car stereos for 15 years so I've heard a lot of different types of setups. I had a pair of Sony XB950BT's that I really liked, but they finally broke, so I needed some replacement cans. I loved the Sony's low end and they didn't sound too bad everywhere else either, so I wanted something comparable. I bought a pair of beats solo3's and was very disappointed with the lack of low end, volume, and overall sound quality. So like any intelligent idiot, I did my research after impulse buying something that didn't fit the bill and came across these ANC 2's. They deliver. I wasn't really sure what the sound quality would be like, but it's way better than I expected. These beat the Sony's in every way, better sound quality, more volume by quite a bit, and bass like a couple of 12's in the trunk with 6-700 watts. It's an impressive amount of bass. The only thing missing is feeling it in your chest when the bassline drops. You'd probably have to spend 2k on a setup in your car to replicate the way these sound as a whole package.

You do need to tweak them some with the equalizer in the skull IQ app. I've found that turning the the low and the low mid about 3 lines down from the top and then adjusting the bass through the crusher wheel gets you the cleanest sound. If you turn the crusher bass all the way off, it loses a lot below about 40Hz. But adjusted like that with the wheel at about 10 or 20% gets you a nice full sound with some good thump on the bottom end but it doesn't get muddy. That way also keeps it fairly linear through the volume range so you don't have way too much bass at lower levels until you turn it up like some other ways I had tried tuning it before. Some songs don't sound great above that, but some you can go all the way to the max on the crusher wheel and still sound clean. These seem to have the highest pressure levels around 40Hz and drop off a fair amount under 30Hz. You can still hear them down to and below 20Hz though, but not nearly at the pressure levels you do at 40Hz. The mids and highs are way cleaner than I expected and these handle rock and classic rock very well. Like I said before, these aren't audiophile quality, but from being in the sound industry for a lot of years, I got picky about sound quality, but still love more than average low end. These marry the two perfectly if tuned right and I don't have any problem with using these as my daily set.

They're also very comfortable. They don't clamp too tight on your ears, and the ear cushions go all the way around my ears. No hotspots. I can wear these for hours and be comfortable. The ANC has a hiss when it's on, but I didn't buy these for noise cancelling so I just turn it off. I can't comment on the durability because I just bought them, but if these hold up long term, they're worth every penny and then some if you're like me and want a ton of bass at times, but also want a nice rich/full sounding set of cans when the mood strikes I love that I can change them from one to the other with the roll of the crusher wheel and not have to do anything else.

They’re great, bass u can feel that rumbles ur skull. But tbh I can’t max out the bass slider because of that. It’s almost unbearable bass at max slider uncomfortably. But yeah.. Super long battery life, super soft, good connectivity. I wouldn’t say it’s the clearest sound I’ve ever used in headphones, but that is to be expected in such a bass heavy one and wireless. The noise cancellation is also great. It doesn’t completely silence the surroundings but it dampens it heavily enough that it’s cool to me. There’s a switch that allows the noise “damper” to turn on or off, to hear ur surroundings better. Pretty neat. Overall, im happy i bought it for sure.

If you love bass, these are for you. They’re comfortable to wear and you can really feel the impact of the bass through your skull. If you were around in the 80s/90s and remember window rattling bass, it’s available with these. The ability to adjust the bass on the fly is nice too! They sound great!
La calidad del bajeo es bueno, dependiendo el tipo de música que escuches claro. La cancelación de ruido del exterior no es muy buena como los beats studio pero definitivamente me gustaron.

I have received them today, and it is a first impression.

Packaging - Top notch
Presentation - Excellent
Unboxing Experience - Excellent
Product Build Quality - Excellent
Out of Box Sound Quality - Excellent
Bass - Actually "Crushing" your bones but not like a rickshaw!

I will update this review after using it for at least a week.
Absolutely brilliant. Definitely worth the money, battery lasts forever and fantastic quality on noise cancelling and base features!

Le Crusher ANC 2 possède un design noir mat super élégant et confortable, qui me convient parfaitement
En effet , ce casque tient super bien sur ma tête pour une utilisation dans les transports en commun notamment, aucune gêne et pas besoin de le réajuster. Même porté 4h de suite aucun mal de tête, cou ou oreilles. Sa batterie est ultra performante (4h d'écoute = -10% de batterie) ce qui est particulièrement appréciable.
La boîte de rangement est semi-rigide ce qui permet de bien protéger le casque dans son sac à dos ou dans sa valise.
La prise en main est simple, les quelques boutons sont facilement identifiables (le bouton pause est concave alors que les 2 boutons augmenter/diminuer le son sont convexes).
L'application est assez simple d'utilisation et facilite la prise en main des différentes fonctions.
Le son est de très bonne qualité et la possibilité d'ajuster les basses à son goût, grâce à une molette est très appréciable. L ANC permet de limiter les sons extérieurs mais ne les coupe pas complètement. En résumé, super expérience avec ce casque, un vrai allier au quotidien pour être dans sa petite bulle.
item87.detail:
Skullcandy Crusher ANC 2 Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones with Sensory Bass, 50 Hr Battery, Skull-iQ, Alexa Enabled, Microphone, Works with Bluetooth Devices - Black What is Crusher Tech? Boost your bass with the sensory bass slider, mellow out or go all in skull crushing! Crusher Tech enhances your iPhone, Android or Computer audio experience.
Custom Sound- The Crusher analyzes your hearing and produces sound specifically for YOU. You'll do a quick test and the Crusher will be tuned to you. We have introduced a new level of comfort to the Crusher range and created our most comfortable headphone
Epic Noise Cancelling - The Crusher ANC 2 has 4 microphones listening to all outside noise to actively mute the outside world. You can also adjust the noise cancellation level between mute, hearing and between.
50 Hour Battery - Skullcandy's biggest battery, get up to 50 hours on a single charge and if you do run out of charge a 10 minute charge will give you 4 hours. Plus, use the preset modes to customize your audio depending on what you're listening to.
Multipoint Pairing - Allows you to pair your headphones to two different devices at once. Connections are managed automatically. If you get a call while watching a movie on your laptop, your connection will switch to the call on your phone like magic.
Buy with Confidence - 1 year US warranty included.

item88.name: ROSIDA Wireless Headphones for TV, Over-Ear Bluetooth 5.0 TV Headset for Seniors, 196ft Wireless Range Support Optical,AUX, RCA and USB Output,High Volume, Hi-Fi Audio&No Delay,Up to 40 Hours Playtime
item88.description:
Perfectly Synced Visual-Audio: Rosida wireless headphones for TV featuring latest wireless 2.4 GHz technology (NOT Bluetooth) ; it reduces the audio lag down to as low as 28ms,significantly less than the 220ms of Standard Bluetooth and the 40ms of aptX Low Latency, you will experience NO lip-sync delay making you immersed in enjoying watching your favorite TV programs in bedroom.
Immersive TV Watching For Seniors: Our TV headphones wireless for seniors are built-in the audio amplifier, provides Hi-Fi stereo sound to watch tremendous live ball games, movies and TV shows without disturbing your children or lovers when they are sleeping or working at night.
Extreme Comfort Design: Soft adjustable over ear pads are made with premium protein leather and memory sponge, shaped for ergonomic fit, our heaphones for TV watching offers you a comfortable wearing experience without any pressure for long time use.
Hassle-Free Set Up & Wide Compatibility: Turn on the transmitter and our wireless headphones for TV, they will be automatically connected. support most TVs with Optical Audio,AUX(3.5mm), RCA, or USB digital output port. While our wireless headphones for tv watching also can be worked as a sperately Bluetooth 5.0 headset,which directly connect it with your mobile phone, laptop, AV receiver and so on via Bluetooth.
Up to 40 Hours Playtime: The headphones wireless for seniors can run up to 40 hours per full charging. Super battery capacity with 1200mAh, no more worrying about the sudden battery drained while watching all shows. Rosida offers product warranty and lifetime customer service, any problems please click your order to contact with us.
reviews: After trying two Bluetooth models that had a disturbing Buzz and returning them I ordered these, they are not Bluetooth! It is some other Technology which they explain. Easy hookup, great sound, very comfortable Headsets. I highly recommend them.

I ordered these since I work on my laptop a lot for sound editing and such.

I'm mainly a bluetooth girl, and they work great for my phone and laptop! It had a 70% charge straight out the box, so I used it right away.

TV-Cable Use: I have a smart TV with Bluetooth capabilities.

The antenna and cable were very easy and fast to set up with the TV! Nice quality sound and i can even control my TV through my headphones (when using an app w/smart TV.)

Note: (cable and antenna method) Even if you have USB connection on your TV, plug in the antenna to a separate power source. The TV intercepts w/ static if the audio cable AND antenna are plugged into the same place.

TV-Bluetooth function: I'd recommend using the provided antenna and audio cable for TV usage. It might be my TV, but the TV-bluetooth sound got a bit shoddy on this method. Still cordless either way!

USB-TV audio function: I don't think my TV has this option, so I wasn't able to test that one.

OVERALL: Very pleased with my purchase. In depth instructions, solid packaging. They're extremely comfy, sturdy, and soft! "All Up In Your Mind" sounds heavenly in these, so good sound.

This pair of headphones sound great, but not for those who love extremely loud blasting music. How loud they can get depends also on the unit. The cushioning around the phones is great making them very comfortable to wear for hours on end and being it's leather, it's not so likely to soak up sweat when worn in hot areas or for a long period of time.

Also, this unit has its own audio voice to indicate that the unit is connected and when you reach max or min volume and tells you when it's on or off when you hit the power button. The up/down volume keys are easy to reach as the are next to the power button on the right ear unit.

WARNING: There is a learning curve to setting this up for the first time and the instructions are rather "touch and go" and thus, could be better. Though the manual implies the set is specifically for TVs, you can use it on stereo equipment by hooking up the unit with the RCA cable it comes with. YOU NEED NOT HAVE A BLUETOOTH DEVICE TO USE THEM! But you must make the correct settings on your TV or stereo to make them work. Just hope you have time and patience to figure it out when setting them up for the first time or switching units to use them on. This can be a pain if you use it with more than one device and move it back and forth a lot.

It comes with small signal box with is a bit tiny with a dimly lit signal light up indicator. This box needs to be hooked up to the power cord when listening through the headset. Being the signal box is so small, just be careful to put it in a table top place where it won't get bumped or fall behind the shelf or table by accident, or you can easily lose it.

Make sure when not in use that the recharging cable is plugged into the headset. Once you power that up, switch the recharging cable back to the signal box so it is getting power.

Despite its tininess and lack of ability to hook it up to multiple devices. I still like it and if you don't mind doing a little tinkering, you will too.
Great sound and easy hook up.

I bought one Rosida Wireless Headphones for TV in April, bought a second one in July for another room & TV. Both crapped out last month. After charging these units are suppose to re pair to base unit at TV. They did not! After following the instructions many times I called Amazon to get contact phone number for Rosida. Tried to call everyday for 2 weeks, always got busy signal. Then I called super early, got through but the number was for a Publishing company. Complete waste of my time. Amazon did give me a partial refund, since I was beyond the 3 month return window. I told Amazon this product was junk and why are they selling it. I suggest finding another brand of headphone and I will not buy electronics from Amazon again. Things they sell should last more than 8 months.

The headphones work great and are very easy to set up. Took only minutes. I bought them because I like to watch television in bed at night and I was always disturbing someone else sleeping in the next room. Everything is quiet now and I can hear my shows just fine. Very pleased.
Alot of background noise, but they are comfortable and work. They keep the noise level down so you don't bother others, but background static is distracting,
Easy to set up and use. Very comfortable on the ears. Very happy with the value and performance.

item89.name: JBL Live 650BTNC, Black - Wireless Over-Ear Bluetooth Headphones - Up to 20 Hours of Noise-Cancelling Streaming - Includes Multi-Point Connection & Voice Assistant (Renewed)
item89.description:
SIGNATURE SOUND - Slip on a pair of JBL LIVE 650BTNC wireless over-ear Bluetooth headphones & elevate your day. Equipped with powerful 40mm drivers, these headphones deliver JBL signature sound with enhanced bass so every track pops.
MUTE DISTRACTIONS - With a lightweight, comfortable design, JBL LIVE 650BTNC includes noise-cancelling technology, so nothing disturbs your groove. Plus, manage calls via buttons on the ear-cup—all without glancing at your phone.
GET HELP FROM VOICE ASSISTANT - Play your favorite playlist, text your friend, check the weather & more by tapping the ear cup to activate the Google voice assistant or Amazon Alexa. Use the JBL app to easily set your preferred voice assistant.
ROCK OUT UNINTERRUPTED - Enjoy up to 30 hours of sound when Active Noise-Cancelling (ANC) is turned off, or 20 hours with ANC & Bluetooth on. Battery died? A quick 15-minute charge lets you extend the fun for up to 2 more hours.
MULTI-POINT CONNECTION - Effortlessly switch from one Bluetooth device to another with multi-point connection. That means you can seamlessly transition from a video on your tablet to a call on your mobile phone, so you never miss a beat.

item90.name: I love e iFecco Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Over-Ear, Foldable HiFi Stereo Headset with Built-in Microphone and Soft Protein Earpads for Travel, Home, Office (Blue)
item90.description:
Enjoy the High Quality Sound:powerful 40mm dynamic drivers reproducs a full range of frequencies from low beats to soaring vocals.IFECCO over the ear headphones also have larger ergonomic earmuffs which have huge noise reduction that blocks out surrounding sound from the outside thereby isolating your music.So you will get better sound from the noise cancelling headphones.
Wirelss or Wired Reliable Connectivity:5.0 bluetooth tech provides a stable connection within 10 metres and fast paring allows you wireless freedom to enjoy high-resolution audio content;It is ompatible with ios and android phone,TV ,Laptop or other devices which have audio bluetooth connection function.A 3.5 mm aux cable is also supplied when you choose the wired headphone connection mode.
Listen Longer:IFECCO headphones with a huge 30 hours of battery life on a single charge give you more play time.You’ll have enough power for even long trips away.
Comfort in the Details:with super-soft Protein Leather on earpads and top of the adjustable headband that fits closer around the head with minimal clamping force. You’ll almost forget you’re wearing them—even after hours of listening.
Multi-Function Headset: Hand-free receiving call can be achieved with built-in microphone. voice chat and call communication. Built-in FM and Support SD Card Playand you can use a TF/Micro SD card with loaded MP3 music and listen to the songs directly on your headphones.
reviews:
I am totally loving this headphone, the color is so vivid and everyone's asking where did I get them.
Now for the fit is the only negative thing I have to complain about. I have a verry large head, larger than most people, and finding things to fit off the shelf is normally impossible. So they are tight on me putting pressure on my ears squeezing my head. But I can deal with it for the time I use them while I am in dialisys. The battrie life is impeccable I will use them for 3 to 4 hrs 3 days a week and the batrie life will be about 50% when I plug them in over the weekend. Charging time is good too from dead I can get 20 to 25% battrie in just under 20min of charging. I am vigilant about turning off the headphones when not using themas well.
The sound quality are close to my older bose headphones I used to have for only about 1 /15% of the cost. As for functions the bluetooth connects easily to phones and pc every time on the first time. As for the FM function I have not been able to get it to work. Which is more of my fault over the headphones at this time. I honestly tried to see if it would work. I was in a building where cellphone have difficulty receiving signals. So I truly did not give it the best shot, but I listen to pand... over the radio most of the time. So I'll try it again some day!!! Impressed with color and sound quality for the price!!!!
I love my pair of headphone and it sound perfect when I hear my music

disappointed... after reading reviews, especially one from an autistic person, i thought the noise canceling was going to be way better. it does decently drowning out noises with audio playing, but that is something regular headphones do anyway.
being autistic myself with sensory overload triggered easiest from sound and a sibling who after learning this intentionally makes noise to spite and trigger you, this not working is terrible for me. i thought i was going to get some peace with these.

i like how it can play while charging, which is exactly what i was hoping for. headphones that can go wired or wireless, and these blue ones are aesthetically pleasing.

the audio quality sounds like it's coming from a next-door neighbor with thin walls and you're sitting next to said wall. the vocals of a song are ok, but the instrumentals are where it gets most muffled.
i will say though, that muffled-ness actually makes certain songs i find have too loud of a snare/beat easier to listen to and not causing any potential inner ear pain.

the headphones themselves aren't super comfortable and hurt on the outer ear not long after wearing them, but it's not unbearable. at least for me, since it's easier to put up with how it physically feels rather than be subjected to the full sounds of things at home.

these are all my thoughts for now. will update if anything that happens.
-
little update: got a refund, so i added a star

UPDATE: I received a replacement and tried it out for a few days. Here is my updated review.

Pros: Battery life lasts quite a good while, goes over the ears and adjusts well
- Turns off by itself if left alone long enough to preserve battery life.

Cons: When watching a live video it slightly "pauses" the audio like a disturbance (lasts for a split second) Sometimes it's like every 5-15 minutes, other times it's back to back (seconds in between).
- It lacks Bass. You can easily fix this with an app on your phone but I mostly use it for my laptop when studying and the audio feels like it's missing life (best way I could put it) It's okay, it's just annoying to adjust it for music though.
- Noise cancelation is average, I can still hear people talking when they're next to me, if it had better bass it would've helped a bit.

All in all, it's an average headset if you're in a budget. At least the replacement works better than the first one.

Old Review: [I bought it to use it for studying and cancel out all distractions. The worst headphone set I've had, the music gets interrupted every 15-30 seconds. It's as if someone paused it then resumed the music for you in a second.

It lacks bass completely, it sounds like someone is talking to you at a normal volume from a distance so you have to crank up the volume. The noise cancelation is a myth and you can hear everything unless you crank it up.

I asked for a replacement to see if the set I received was defective or not, will update once I receive the new one.]

I'm surprised how well these headphones work given their price. No issues pairing and the bass response is nice. When they arrived, they were super snug because I have a rather large head, but after stretching them out for a day or so they fit nicely. It will be hard for me to spend a lot of money on a pair of headphones now–these work very well for my usage (Zoom/work, CPU, light music/youtube), so no need.

The left earphone broke away from the headband after five months of gentle use. The attachment point where the earpieces attach to the headband are particularly weak. It looks like it could be repaired but I doubt if the manufacturer will provide the part or instructions to do so. I will not buy from this manufacturer, IFECCO, again..

These Wireless Bluetooth Headphones offer a range of features that make them a practical choice for music lovers. They have a built-in FM radio and can play MP3 music from a TF/Micro SD card. With hands-free calling and high-quality stereo sound, you can enjoy your favorite tunes while on the go. Overall, these headphones provide convenience and good audio performance.
qualità prezzo buono
Buen sonido
Lite hårda på huvudet efter lång användning. Annars mycket bra. Både ljud- och utseende/kvalitetsmässigt.

Vorab, ich bin kein Tester und verweigere auch jegliche dieser Art!

Kommen wir zu den Kopfhörer, für einen Kleinen Preis so einen guten Klang zu bekommen ist wirklich super. Ich kann weder meckern noch negatives behaupten. Ich würde es wieder kaufen.

Livraison rapide comme toujours avec Amazon prime. Ce casque Bluetooth est facilement pliable . Il peut être rangé et mis dans un sac et n’est pas lourd comme certain casque Bluetooth.Les oreillettes peuvent être pivotées et la mousse permet d’avoir un bon confort au niveau des oreilles . Ce casque Bluetooth est compatible avec les téléphones portable, pour ma part il fonctionne très bien avec mon iPhone et mon ordinateur. Le temps de charge est assez rapide et le Bluetooth porte sur une bonne distance. Livré avec câble de charge et câble connexion sans Bluetooth . Il est donné pour 30 heures d’écoute mais je ne l’ai testé que sur 2 heures. A voir avec le temps si les batteries tiennent la charge.

item91.name: Edifier WH700NB Active Noise Cancelling Headphones - 68H Playtime - AI Call Noise Cancellation - Dual Device Connection - Lightweight & Foldable Design - Fast Charge - Bluetooth 5.3 - Gray
item91.description:
Enhanced Active Noise Cancellation: Experience advanced multi-mode active noise cancellation designed for both outdoor and indoor environments, including commuting, library, airplane, and subway use. Our ANC technology expertly isolates unwanted noise, creating a serene background for your music.
Up to 68 Hours Playback Time: Enjoy an impressive playback time of up to 68 hours with ANC off. A 10-minute charge gives you 8 hours of uninterrupted use, ensuring your music keeps pace with your lifestyle.
Crystal-Clear Call Clarity: Powered by advanced Al algorithms and a single microphone with DNN noise cancellation, the headphones picks up human voice clearly even under noisy conditions. Effortlessly engage in hands-free calls or tele-conferences with impeccable clarity.
Superb Sound Quality: Equipped with 40mm dynamic drivers coated in Titanium, the WH700NB headphones deliver deep, impactful bass and crystal-clear high frequencies.
Fully Foldable For a Comfortable Use: Designed for your comfort, the W700NB headphones boast skin-friendly ear cushions and a soft-toned headband. The foldable and compact design enhances portability, making them your ideal on-the-go companions.
reviews: I hadn't heard of this brand before, but I will start looking for their products because these headphones are really great for the price. They are very lightweight and comfortable to wear for long periods around the house. They do a great job of isolating me from the noise and voices when I'm trying to get some relaxing me-time. They're easy to pair and easy to control pandora. Really just an incredible design and quality. Very happy with these great headphones.

I'm no audiophile so I can't speak to the fidelity or acoustics of the Edifiers as compared to others in this class of headphones. But I can say that they sound pretty good to me. Easy pairing with my phone and, bonus, will pair with a second device. This is a feature that I can appreciate, since I often switch between my laptop and phone. Not having to reset the headphones each time I switch is a convenience I can appreciate.

The fit is comfortable, maybe even plush.

The noise cancelling is not exceptional, but does cut the background noise slightly.

What I do like is the price. Given the quality of design and sound, the price is right.

This is my 3rd pair of Noise Canceling Headphones. I mainly use Noise Canceling Headphones to listen to music (or books) while doing yard work (to cancel out noise of lawnmower & edger). Understand that these are not 100% noise cancelling (none of my three are). You will still hear ambient sound while wearing these (without music). However, music or text can be easily heard – at a relatively low volume – even when ambient noise is quite loud.

My 1st pair of Noise Canceling Headphones is circa 2005 (no Bluetooth AAA battery powered) and has been my favorite – until now.

INCLUDED ITEMS (pic) are the Headphones, USB-C charging cable, and a bunch of (mostly useless) documents.

INSTRUCTIONS/MANUAL
For me, the instructions were pretty confusing. Fortunately, basic operation of these Headphones is fairly intuitive. However, due to the confusing instructions, I feel there are a few features I will not be able to use.

Included in one of the other documents is contact info for the company.
A personal preference: I always prefer direct contact info to the manufacturer/seller.
I was pleased to see contact info was included with this item.

OPERATION
Positive aspects
As I stated, basic operation is pretty intuitive. I was easily able to pair these Headphones with my music device. I then spent about an hour using all three of my Noise Canceling Headphones – rotating one after the other – and comparing them with each other.

Of my three Noise Canceling Headphones, these are the most comfortable. In addition, it took me very little time to operate the controls by feel alone. These are much easier to operate than my other Bluetooth Headphones.

Negative aspects
The features associated with the “+” and “–” buttons are pretty straight forward. However, there are six functions associated with the power button. I will have to experiment with these in order to understand how they work. Mainly they have to do with phone-use controls while wearing these Headphones (one I am totally in the dark about).

Of my three Noise Canceling Headphones, these are the only ones that did not come with a protective case.

WHY ONLY 3-STARS?
I took away one star for each of the following reasons:
o Confusing instructions
o Lack of any storage / protective container

These headphones are ok sound wise. I was a little disappointed because in the listing it says they have their own app for EQ controls and ANC but it’s just 3 preset settings. The ANC works well and the earphones have a good soft ear pads to help with noise but if you’re sensitive to sound these aren’t for you. If you’re looking for something simple these will work but if you’re a big audiophile I’d definitely look for higher quality.

These headphones are comfortable, well padded and suitable for office use. Sound quality is not premium, a bit too much treble and the bass /midrange could be richer, but is more than acceptable for this price point. The noise cancellation works well and combined with the closed back design, it does an excellent job of taming environmental noise. The included instruction sheet provides easy steps to follow for pairing, the diagram provided for device controls is difficult to interpret, however. (noise cancellation is toggled with the button with the bluetooth logo on it)

These headphones arrive well packaged, I found them very easy to connect to my phone.
The next step was to download the Edifier app, which is simple but works well enough.

They're light and very comfortable to wear over an extended period.
The controls are easy to use physical buttons, and I'm so pleased they are as I hate touch sensitive panels on similar headphones.
They also feel quite sturdy and well made.

The appearance is quite plain and innocuous, but I like that as they're less of a target for muggers!

The noise cancelling is pretty good but can't compete with far more expensive models.... this is to be expected though.
The noise cancelling performance for the price is very good though and makes train journeys more peaceful.

The ambient sound setting is very useful when you want to listen to announcements on the train or talk to someone.

The sound quality is okay but not amazing.
It's got the typical v shaped sound profile with emphasised bass and treble.... the mid range suffers because of this.
Sound stage is also quite narrow, but again that's typical of most closed back headphones.

The app allows 4 different settings for the sound, but i stick to classic as the others make the sound a bit worse to my ears.

Battery life has been very good and charges quickly via USB C.

I would recommend you get a pouch or carry case if you want to keep them in top condition.

For under £50 these really do offer excellent value for money, they're not the best sounding but they're more than adequate.
They would make a fantastic present for a lucky someone.

I hope you find my review helpful.

Sorti de son emballage on trouve le casque, un câble USB-C vers USB-A pour recharger son accu, et un mode d'emploi multilingue assez minimaliste.

La finition est assez basique mais correcte, ce casque fermé est pliable au niveau des écouteurs, ce qui limite son encombrement lorsqu'il est inutilisé, mais il est dommage qu'un sac ne soit pas fourni pour le ranger.
Des minuscules repères "R et L" sont présents sur le montant intérieur des écouteurs pour indiquer la Droite et la Gauche. Les boutons de commande à l'arrière de l'écouteur droit sont facilement accessibles grâce à leur relief, sous le même écouteur se trouvent la prise USB-C pour recharger et le bouton d'appairage Bluetooth.

Avant la première utilisation il faut charger complètement l'accu, ce qui lui offrira une autonomie maximale de 68 heures de fonctionnement sans ANC, et 45 heures avec ANC activé. Si on recharge 10 minutes l'accu vide, cela lui suffit pour 8 heures d'autonomie.
Ensuite il faut appairer en Bluetooth de manière classique, ce casque apparaissant dans la liste des périphériques sous le nom de "EDIFIER WH700NB". En scannant le QR code sur l'emballage on peut installer l'application "Edifier Connect" qui permet de nombreux réglages.

Ce casque permet de se connecter à deux périphériques simultanément en Bluetooth, ce qui m'est indispensable puisque j'utilise souvent simultanément un téléphone et un lecteur HiFi ou MP3. Cependant il fonctionne uniquement en Bluetooth et ne dispose pas d'une prise pour l'utiliser de manière filaire.

À l'usage :
- L'appairage BT se fait sans problème et facilement, même pour deux connexions simultanées.
- L'ANC n'est pas très performant et risque de ne pas satisfaire les amateurs d'isolation face aux bruits ambiants.
- Au niveau qualité sonore, c'est peut-être satisfaisant lorsqu'on ne recherche pas une approche de la HiFi, mais le son est empâté et ça manque d'air, les "graves" sont du style bas médium qui s'étale et le haut médium et l'aigu manquent de définition et d'amplitude. globalement c'est flatteur si on apprécie la variété enrobée mais cela ne conviendra pas aux amateurs de son HiFi ou aux amateurs de musique de qualité et travaillée.
Ceci-dit il faut relativiser, on en a pour son argent et ces écouteurs sont écoutables, ne blessent pas l'oreille et devraient combler nombre d'utilisateurs.
- Le port du casque est assez confortable et l'arceau se règle facilement pour s'adapter à toutes les têtes.

En conclusion ce casque n'a vraiment rien à voir avec la HiFi, il n"est pas assez neutre et défini à mon goût, mais il me semble cependant assez correct dans le genre "flatteur et coloré" dans cette gamme de prix, son choix dépendra de vos besoins et de vos goûts finalement …

These are the third pair of Edifier headphones I've had and I've been delighted with all of them. The previous ones were in ear so this is the first opportunity I've had to test some larger over ear units and it's interesting to compare.

Pros:
- Excellent sound quality considering the price. You can also modify the balance to better suit your own preferences.
- Easy to set up and use app giving you additional controls.
- Build quality feels solid though still lightweight. These aren't going to match £200+ competitors but are perfectly decent.
- Easy to set up and to connect, just took a few seconds and the connection remained strong.

Cons:
- Slightly lighter than I might like personally but this purely my preference.
- Don't fold as much as some other options.

Overall these are an excellent pair of headphones at a very strong price point that I would happily recommend. I've used for music, podcasts and video calls and they were good on all 3, especially the speech based options. If you are looking for headphones primarily for music there may be better options out there but at this price these are excellent all rounders.

Casque edifier les mousses recouvrent bien les oreilles et sont tres confortables.
Il est possible de l'ajuster et de le plier pour le ranger egalement.
Livré avec cable de recharge usb C et boite carton.
Le son est bon, les basses puissantes et les medium et aigus precis pour ce tarif cest surprenant .
Seul reproche lutilisation un peu compliqué de part le fait que les boutons sont multifonctions.
Sinon la couleur bleu est sympas et il a un bon rapport qualité prix.
Je le recommande pour les petits budgets.
Ps :Il fonctionne avec appli dommage je suis pas fan mais passage obligatoire pour les reglages (voice canceling, reduction de bruit etc)

I am always on the lookout for a decent bluetooth headset, time for an upgrade it seems.

The Edifier 700NB headphones are certainly well made, feel good in the hands and comfortable on the head too. In the box you get a manual, warranty card, usb-c cable and the headphones themselves.

Connecting via bluetooth is pretty easy, you get an audible confirmation as well, the headset also has a dual mode, so you can connect two devices and it will remember them as well. It has (beside the bluetooth button), buttons for volume up/down, power and the charging port as well. The quality of the headphones are on par with what I would call a very premium product.

The Ediifier 700NB even has an android app, although sadly not for windows pcs. speaking of windows, there is a mic too, so you can use it to game/chat with as well. I completely missed it on my first test of the headphones, till i connected it to my pc/laptop.

The app for android can be downloaded from the play store, if your planning on using it with your phone, then you can tailor the headphones for ambient sound/noise cancellation and music type such as rock/pop/jazz effects. it also has a game mode too all on the app.

When paired with a laptop/pc tablet under windows you can still engage "game mode" by double tapping the bluetooth button. There is no windows app that I could find in the ms store. which was a shame. But the headphones performed just fine under windows 11, good quality sound. I performed a speaker test on headset, was quite suprised just how well the drivers responded to the shifting frequency changes.

Comfortable headphones, partially foldable for stowaway/transport, long run time, easy connect, game mode, adjustable sound settings and a mic too, makes the headset a premium product indeed. Definately a worthy buy.
item91.detail:
Edifier WH700NB Active Noise Cancelling Headphones - 68H Playtime - AI Call Noise Cancellation - Dual Device Connection - Lightweight & Foldable Design - Fast Charge - Bluetooth 5.3 - Gray Enhanced Active Noise Cancellation: Experience advanced multi-mode active noise cancellation designed for both outdoor and indoor environments, including commuting, library, airplane, and subway use. Our ANC technology expertly isolates unwanted noise, creating a serene background for your music.
Up to 68 Hours Playback Time: Enjoy an impressive playback time of up to 68 hours with ANC off. A 10-minute charge gives you 8 hours of uninterrupted use, ensuring your music keeps pace with your lifestyle.
Crystal-Clear Call Clarity: Powered by advanced Al algorithms and a single microphone with DNN noise cancellation, the headphones picks up human voice clearly even under noisy conditions. Effortlessly engage in hands-free calls or tele-conferences with impeccable clarity.
Superb Sound Quality: Equipped with 40mm dynamic drivers coated in Titanium, the WH700NB headphones deliver deep, impactful bass and crystal-clear high frequencies.
Fully Foldable For a Comfortable Use: Designed for your comfort, the W700NB headphones boast skin-friendly ear cushions and a soft-toned headband. The foldable and compact design enhances portability, making them your ideal on-the-go companions.

item92.name: GOLREX Bluetooth Headphones Wireless Earbuds 36Hrs Playtime Wireless Charging Case Digital LED Display Over-ear Earphones with Earhook Waterproof Headset with Mic for Sport Running Workout Sierra Blue
item92.description:
1. Dual LED Digital Display & 36hrs Playtime: Wireless earbuds with dual power display show the remaining battery of the case by the number on the screen, and the charging status of ear buds by up and down of the LED bar, which will fade when the headphones are fully charged. Bluetooth headphones with 650mAh charging case have up to 36hrs playback with 5 additional charges, you can get the extra electricity it takes to keep your music going. (5-6hrs in buds with 50%-80% volume / 30hrs in case)
2. Wireless Charging & USB Type-C Charge: Bluetooth earbuds support wireless charging and Type-C charge. One is just putting the case on the QI-certified charging mat (not included) with the LED display facing up. Besides, wireless earbuds with ear hooks come equipped with a Type-C cable to charge the case. Two convenient charging methods improve the battery life of wireless headphones to 1 hour on 15mins charge. The number on the left screen flashes when the charging case is being charged.
3. One Button Control & Auto On/Connect: The multi-function button on each earphone can manage audio play or calls effortlessly. Skip songs, launch music, and answer calls simply by tapping your earbuds wireless bluetooth, so you don't need to adjust the music by your device. Automatically power on and connect to your device when simply removing headphones wireless bluetooth from the case, for quick and easy operation. With ear buds seated in the case, wireless earphones shut down and recharge.
4. High-fidelity Audio & Crystal-clear Call: Bluetooth headsets adopt 11mm drivers and volume-optimized active EQ to keep audio clear and balanced at any volume, and the high compliance diaphragm reproduces a rich bass range, also enhances sound quality and reduces distortion. Mics work together to reduce noises around you, keeping your voice sounding clear  for fewer distractions during phone calls. Bluetooth technology provides a strong, consistent connection to your device within 30 feet.
5. Design for Sports & IPX7 Sweat-resistant: Wireless earbuds bluetooth with soft, flexible, and secure-fit ear hooks gently to the contours of your ears without falling out even for workout. Adjustable earhooks and ergonomic design ensure your headphones stay comfortably firm in place when running, hiking, jogging, and other activity. IPX7 waterproof withstands splashes, workouts, and rainy days. Enjoy sports and outdoor activities without worrying about getting wet or sweaty.
reviews:
I bought these on prime day for $27.81. I have a price checker and from what I see the are usually around $30-40, which is still cheap.

First and foremost, you might be asking why would I buy these. I was looking for iPX7 or iPX8 wireless earbuds so I can listen to music while I shower. The Air Pod Pros are iPX4, which are not good for showering, they cut out every time. The higher the iPX the more water resistant they are.

For this price I was very skeptical because you get what you pay for. Also, I needed something cheap since I already have Air Pod Pros.

Now let’s compare:
Note: This is only Day 1 and I will update this review if it doesn’t hold up!

Price:
-Golrex $30-40 vs AirPod Pros $200.

Wireless distance:
-Golrex claims 33 feet vs Air Pod Pros claim 50 feet.
-They both cut out around the same distance. I left my phone in my bedroom, and I went all the way to my back door of my garage, which is on the opposite side of the house until they finally began to cut out.
-Very shocking, and with this price I was expecting it to cut right when I left my bedroom.

Battery:
Can’t compare only day one and I haven’t wore them long.
*3 month update
-They last longer than my Air Pod Pros, but I always have noise cancellation on with my Air Pod Pros, which drains the battery. Air Pod Pros last about 3-4 hours. While Glorex is about 5 to 6 hours.

Features:
-Golrex for $30-40 you get led screen, volume control, Siri, and a few more, but Air Pod pros clearly win in this category.

Feel:
They both feel like a high quality products.

Case:
Golrex features are actually better than Air Pod Pros when it comes to the case. The size is bulkier though, but if that doesn’t bother you. Golrex is the clear winner in this category!

Phone connection:
Both connect easy.

Sound quality:
-This is where I was skeptical, but it’s honestly not bad.
-The bass is really good on the Golrex, but the blend between the voices and bass are nowhere near Air Pod Pro level.

Comfortability:
Golrex feels great in my ears and they don’t fall out vs Air Pod Pros feel sketchy at times while working out and I have knocked them out a couple of times.

Color:
Golrex wins in this category. The air pod pros are just white and nothing special to them.

Shower:
Golrex claims iPX7. I haven’t went swimming with them yet, but I did shower. My music didn’t muffle one time vs Air Pod Pros, which are IPX4, they will go out on you in the shower and you have to let them dry for them to come back. This is annoying, $200 and they are only IPX4!

Conclusion:
I left a review for a reason. l felt as a customer I got more than I expected. Really good overall earbuds being wireless and not corded.
Are these Air Pod Pros? no.
Are they good earbuds? yes.
Do you need to spend for $200 instead of these? That’s up to you. But, if you’re on a budget I would not spend $200. These work honestly just fine for working out, cutting the grass, etc.

Hope this helps anyone looking to buy. This is not a paid review, just leaving my honest feedback.

P.S. I will be using these more than the shower, and alternating with my Air Pod Pros.

3 Month Update:
They still work. I also found new tips for the earbuds. They are called SpinFit CP100 Plus for IEM. These tips will make the sound of your earbuds even better! I advise you to change the tips of this earbuds to SpinFit CP100 Plus. These specific tips will help improve sound, isolation, and comfort. I got the medium for my ears, but they have: Small, Medium, and Large.

*4 Month Update:

The left earbud has stopped working completely, but after contacting Golrex, they shipped a new set to me for free through their lifetime warranty. Make sure to register your product if you decide to get these earbuds to activate the Lifetime Warranty.

Bought these to replace my old pair that had broken. These headphones are comfortable and easy to wear. I use them when doing intense exercise as well as just doing things around the house. They stay in place and have a good battery life and are easy to recharge. They have a good volume level and seem easy to pair with my cell phone. Happy with this product.

Amazing over-ear headphones! These are so comfortable & very well made. Since I started working out again, I needed some over-ear headphones & these are great. They don't fall or slip as the tips (it does come with 3 different sizes to choose from), sits comfortably in your ears & wraps almost completely around your ears.

The sound is powerful, especially if you listen to music with a lot of bass like I do. The treble is outstanding as well, words are crisp even through the bass.

Sometimes, I usually have just one side in & the other hanging off my ear & it stays put. I'm clumsy so here & there I will hit it off my ear & this thing has bounced off of everything in my home & is unbelievably durable.

The battery life is soooooo good! I've literally gone a week without charging it & that's with using it for at least 3-4 hours every morning! That might not seem very long but I've had others that would only last a couple days before having to charge them again. These come with a charger but since everything we have are C-cord connectef, I just use what is available. It only takes a couple hours, if even, to be at full charge.

I will definitely be getting another one of these once these go kaput... that's how good they are! I highly recommend you get one, too... you won't regret it!!

This product is seriously an amazing value. It does almost everything better than the majority of similar name brand products. Where it falters is sound quality. It is pretty good but it's definitely not amazing. Highs, lows and mids are all pretty okay but all are a little muddy. The mids are the muddiest which is what makes it sound like you're listening just a little under water. Audio quality is still good and again, better than some name brand products. Overall, amazing for well under fourty bucks.

The rest is pretty nice. Carry/charge case is a little big but that's what you get for over the ear buds. The readout on the inside is really nice but not totally needed. Fit heirs on the med-large ear size, is comfortable and overall feel, fit and finish of everything is middle-high quality. Seems rugged and I hugely appreciate the physical buttons for control rather than touch buttons like the vast majority of name brand competitors. Battery life is alright on the buds at around 4-5hrs because the case will charge them about 4x or more. Not sure how they'll hold up over time but they're so cheap they're borderline disposable ~1yr.

I love that they wrap around my ears, so that they don't fall off when I run. They look and sound great, no complaints. They were very easy to set up. Noise canceling? Hard to say honestly... I think it's what you expect. Charging is easy/fast.

I wouldn't call these noise cancelling BUT i will say they hit the mark on every other feature. Range on these is amazing. I can go into another room. downstairs, outside and still have good sound and even talk on the phone. I use these in the shower when I WASH MY HAIR. these are my shower head phones. not only do they not fall off, but i can wear them to wash my hair. Come on.
Good sound, pairs easily, holds a charge. I’ve bought 2 pair— had a problem with the second, but the seller replaced it promptly. Great customer service.

Absolutely love these. Great battery life. It even tells you how much you have left for each ear piece. They stay in place so it's a perfect fit. They are also lightweight. If you don't like just earbuds and want a more secure fit, this is for you.

item93.name: Intoberp Headphones Wireless Bluetooth Over Ear, 40 Hours Playtime Wireless Headphones with Microphone,Foldable Light Weight Headset with HiFi Stereo Sound for Travel Work (White)
item93.description:
🎵[Advanced Noise Cancellation Technology] The noise canceling headphones adopt advanced ENC technology to reduce noise in crowded and noisy environments like aviation. Reducing ambient noises by up to 96%, it enables you to immerse yourself into your preferred music, movies, audiobooks, or videos without distracting sounds.
🎵[40+Hour Longer Playtime] A built-in battery keeps your wireless Bluetooth headphones stay powered, so you can enjoy your world without noise for 40 hours long time on a single charge. Plus, plug in 3.5mm stereo audio cable to extend the playtime when in a low battery level.
🎵[HiFi Audio Sound] Intoberp ENC headphones equipped with cutting-edge 40mm drivers bring clear, rich and remarkable wireless music, which will help you enjoy music better. Revel in undisturbed listening with fully balanced bass and high-fidelity tones in extraordinary clarity.
🎵[Clear Hands-Free Calling] Bluetooth headphones are built-in HD microphone with advanced audio sign processing enabling clear and hands-free calling. Easy to pause, play, skip tracks, volume, activate your voice assistant, and answer phone calls via handy button control.
🎵[Stunning Wireless Performance] with Bluetooth 5.3, our wireless headphones offer a more stable transmission, lower latency, and better audio output, which give you wonderful music enjoyment. Wide compatibility makes it ideal for travel, home, office, and outdoor.
reviews: I'm not about to say these are better than Beats, but for $40, they are awesome. They charge USB-c, the charge lasts forever, and they're as comfy as $40 can be. Every now and again, I have to shift them to adjust, but I think that's normal. I'm pretty content with the quality, and I even fall asleep with them on sometimes. The Bluetooth connection is great; no issues there. I'm super satisfied :)
Decent headphones for the price. I just didn't like the way they fit.

item94.name: ZIHNIC Bluetooth 5.3 Noise Cancelling Headphones, Over-Ear Wireless Headset with 60H Playtime,Low Latency Game Mode, Lightweight, Deep Bass Hi-Fi Sound for Travel, Home, Office - Black
item94.description:
𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐀𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐍𝐨𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐂𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠: ZIHNIC wireless headphones are engineered to significantly reduce ambient noise in low and mid-frequency ranges, such as city traffic and airplane cabins. Enjoy an immersive music experience in various environments, from subways to planes, in peace and tranquility.
𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐅𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 & 𝐑𝐨𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐁𝐚𝐬𝐬:Equipped with 40mm large-aperture drivers, these ANC headphones deliver exceptional Hi-Res audio and rich, deep bass. They bring out the finest sound details, offering an unparalleled auditory experience that highlights every nuance.
𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲 & 𝐂𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: Featuring a superior built-in microphone and advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ZIHNIC headphones ensure crystal-clear hands-free calls. Enjoy rapid pairing with a wide range of Bluetooth devices and a stable connection up to 33 feet (10 meters) away, free from the constraints of wires.
𝐄𝐫𝐠𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭: Crafted with skin-friendly protein leather and plush memory foam earpads, these headphones provide gentle, snug comfort without pressure. They are lightweight, fully adjustable, and have earcups that swivel 90°to ensure the perfect fit and ease of use.
𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞 & 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠:Enjoy up to 60 hours of continuous playtime, making these headphones ideal for extended use during travel. They recharge rapidly, achieving full charge in just 1.5 hours. Added benefits include a 12-month warranty and 24-hour customer service, ensuring your satisfaction and support.
reviews:
I've been using these headphones literally every day for more than a year, and they're still performing extremely well.

They reliably and consistently connect to my devices. When I power these headphones up, I simply know that they're going to connect. Not so with my previous headphones that cost nearly as much. With my previous headphones (that did not have any noise cancellation feature), it was a roll of the dice every time I wanted to connect to my devices. Sometimes I would have to cycle them 2 or 3 times just to get them to connect.

The build quality is excellent. Battery life is also very good...diminished somewhat if the noise cancelling feature is enabled. They're also comfortable to wear for hours on end.

I would definitely buy these headphones again. They're a very good value.

Although I rarely use it, the noise cancellation feature is robust, especially for mid-range frequencies. A characteristic of any noise-cancellation technology is a slight sensation of over-pressure, but it's not objectionable. It's most noticeable when the noise cancellation feature is first enabled, and again when it's switched off.

I highly recommend these headphones for daily use.

Back in 2019 I purchased the TaoTronics SoundSurge 46 headphones and I love them. They're no longer for sale on Amazon and they Toatronics US won't send their headphones overseas, so I ordered a these ZIHNIC headphones as a possible replacement as the earpads have fallen off and disintergrated.

I really like them. The sound is great, although a tad boomy but that can be a good thing depending on the music you like.

My only complaint is that the Bluetooth range/distance is really poor and I dearly would love to find a pair as good as these or the taotronics that has the range the taotronics had. The ZIHNIC's start to lose the connection even at 5m sometimes and you'd be lucky to get 15m in a straight line before losing the connection completely. With the Taotronics I could be 100m line of sight and still have a great connection. Or be 20m away and behind two steel shed walls and still get a connection.

They're tough and the noise cancelling is great but not quite as good as the Taotronics. Close enough though.

So if anyone knows of a set of bluetooth (preferably 5.0+) headphones please recommended them.

If you're sitting close to the bluetooth transmitter with the ZIHNIC's then they're ideal. Great for the price.

And battery life is fantastic but I do tend to top them up at least every two days.
the noise canceling is a little weak. I just play grey noise when I need silence. The sound quality is good for music. Price was right. Nice product over all, satisfied customer.
What's not to like? Comfortable, good sound quality, long lasting battery life. Would buy again.

I got this because I was having trouble hearing audio while on flights. I am sure that they do not work as well as the $200-300 sets that are sold but they seem to work quite well for me. I can hear audio without having to strain and the noise cancellation reduces the background noise sufficiently. The battery life is quite robust and they charge up quickly. The carrying case is nice and I don't worry about them breaking in my backpack. I only use these a couple hours a month and so they were well worth the money for me.

Sound quality is good with a lot of bass. Integrated microphone is not the best but decent enough to make calls

The noise cancelling works great and is reducing background noise greatly however it makes some white noise, which is not really important when you are in a noisy environement thus the button to activate and deactivate the noise canceling is a nice addition.

This comes with a jack connector and cable, I am able to plug it in the entertainment system during flight.
I had seats near the jet engine, kids .. and the noise canceling is perfect for those situations plus the audio is much better than any headsets handed out during flights

Bought these to replace my failing earbuds...They work great. Sound quality is excellent and the noise cancellation works very well. These are a great value for the money if you are looking for good, comfortable headphones but don't want to spend a bunch! If I had a complaint, it would be the bluetooth does take a bit to connect...my earbuds would connect almost instantly - these take 10 or 15 seconds to connect. Its not that big of a deal, but its the only criticism I have!

The headphones came nicely packaged which is a plus. They also came charged which is super awesome. They are comfortable so far, I'm no expert but the sound quality is amazing. My one drawback so far is that I have to disconnect from my phone in order to connect to my laptop. I mean it's not a huge deal since I generally only use one device at a time.

I haven't tried the calling feature as yet. All in all if you follow the Manual the setup should be seamless.

Enjoy an immersive music experience in various environments, from subways to planes, in peace and tranquility.

𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞 & 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠:Enjoy up to 60 hours of continuous playtime, making these headphones ideal for extended use during travel. They recharge rapidly, achieving full charge in just 1.5 hours. Added benefits include a 12-month warranty and 24-hour customer service, ensuring your satisfaction and support.

item97.description:
【Game mode &Low-latency】FINGERTIME wireless headphones features advanced low-latency technology, ensuring that your audio stays in sync with the visual content on your screen. Click the power button to switch the game mode,with low-latency technology, there is virtually no delay between what you see and what you hear, making it perfect for gamers, video editors, and anyone who requires fast, accurate audio.
【High Fidelity Audio】Bluetooth headphones deliver crystal crisp highs, balanced mids and powerful bass through 40mm acoustic stereo drivers. You can enjoy high-quality crystal clear stereo sound with our over-ear headphones.
【Strong Bluetooth 5.3 Tech】FINGERTIME Wireless Bluetooth Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth-enabled devices. Advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology provides a more stable, faster Bluetooth connection. It can be paired with two devices at once and seamlessly switch between them.
【Relax all day】Made by premium materials, 0.43lb FINGERTIME over-ear headphones wireless bluetooth. Adjustable headband and suspension type earmuffs makes it easy to fit all sizes heads without pains. Soft and comfortable memory protein earmuffs will not feel pressure and fatigue for long term use.
【After Sale Protection】Gift packaging include a Foldable Deep Bass Headphone, 3.5mm backup audio cable, USB charging cable and User Manual. Iifetime worry free user support, contact us anytime if you have any questions about the product, we will reply within 24 hours
reviews:
These sound great and the best part About is.

I DON'T EVEN HAVE TO CHARGE THEM OFTEN!!!! This was an excellent purchase I highly recommend!

I love these headphone. Great price, very sturdy, and great fit to my head. They have great sound quality, only has noise cancellation when turned all the way up tho lol. Only thing I’m not crazy about is that you can hear what’s being played when they’re turned up and I’m wearing them. Don’t like when others can hear what I’m listening to. But for the price, they’re pretty great!

I am obsessed with headphones and so far these are my favorite pair. They don’t hurt my ears even after wearing for a long time. The battery life is great as is the sound quality. I hope they start making them in better colors.
Good sound quality and noise blocking. I really love that I can use these wired in or wireless with my desktop or tablet. So easy to switch back and forth.
Super Comfy with Great Noise Cancellation and Decent Sound Profile. Good Buy for the Money. Would purchase again. Anxious to compare to other models side by side.
The headphones work great but they are NOT low latency!!
These headphones work well and are very easy to use. I like the way they look and the sound quality is great!

Bang for your buck, these are great. I got these to use with work calls and they've been great. While they don't have "killer" sound, they sound very good for both calls and entertainment. I haven't had a need to push the volume to the max, so I don't know how well they perform under that demand. I've been able to use these with Microsoft Teams for calls and they work just as expected.

For the cost, you may not find a better wireless set of over the ear headphones to give a try!

item98.name: bmanl Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth Headphones 48hrs Play Back Sport Earphones with LED Display Over-Ear Buds with Earhooks Built-in Mic Headset for Workout Green
item98.description:
Dual LED Displays Charging Case: Wireless earbuds with LED display make it obvious to show the battery power of the case and ear buds. The remaining power in percentage on the screen is shown to the left of the bluetooth headphones. The right side is assigning to a charging process of each bud, there are separated power consumption indicators by 4 grids in total, each grid represents 25% power of bud. During Charging, the LED indicator light will flash.
Bluetooth and Stereo Sound Quality: bluetooth earbuds adopt bluetooth technology, which can offer a clear and smooth connection, allowing you to hear crystal clear calls like you are communicating face to face with others. Don't worry about interruptions on listing to music and calling.
One Button Control and Auto Pairing: Compared with touch control, button control is easy so that you can obviate any operations and don't need to remember its instruction. When you pick wireless earphones out of the charging case, they'll automatically connect to the paired previous device. The range can reach up to 33ft away. When you put it back, the bluetooth earphones shut down and are recharging.
Designed for Sports: Sport headphones to keep you motivated, a secure fit that won’t shift or fall out during long hours of training, and no wires to hold you back. Equipped with 3 pairs of ear caps and flexible earhooks, which can stay on your ears and get a suitable fitting. So that you will not feel tired and pain when wearing it for a long time. bluetooth earphones can fit for camping, running, or working out, even on a rainy day.
reviews:
I highly recommend these earbuds for anyone looking for Bluetooth earbuds. I have owned several ear only buds, but always have them fall out. This set of over the ear buds work great. I have not had any issues with them falling out or off my ears. I’m extremely impressed with the range capabilities and quality of the units. The battery last extremely long and charges, from the case, quickly. I have the ability now to listen to my phone and music from another room without the sound cutting out.
They are very comfortable to wear and easy to clean, which is recommended by the manufacturer and audiologist to prevent ear infection. A little gentle soap on a soft cloth is all it takes and the buds come off to be able to rinse them under the faucet.
I highly recommend them for anyone looking for over the ear earbuds.

So I’ve had these earbuds for a little over a year. I originally got them so I could do phone calls in the car. In regards to that, they work decently, but sometimes people wouldn’t be able to hear me too great. That is pretty much the only con for these.

They’re awesome for listening though. If I’m at work and need to listen to something on my phone I just pop them in my ear and I’m good to go. They automatically connect to the phone once you take them out of the charging case, so that’s super convenient. The sound is good quality, crisp and clean. They also have 3 different size ear attachments so should be good for most people. I was fine with the default one so haven’t had to mess with that. They are comfortable even when using for a while whereas normally

What honestly amazed me was the customer support. I had an issue with them due to misuse from my children. I contacted the seller and asked if I could buy a replacement part. They ended up shipping me a new one free of charge. This was just a few weeks ago after I had them for about a year so kudos to them for the amazing support. There is a lifetime warranty, but you need to register within 15 days of buying. Make sure to do this! I’m guessing they felt pity for me, but it was very nice regardless.

Overall, very satisfied with this purchase. Especially with the price these are a must grab!

I have Meniere's Disease and have found over the years that ear buds make the pressure in my ears worse. These are the first earbuds that I have found that wear comfortably, they don't fly off every time you turn your head, the sound is fantastic, and most importantly they don't hurt my ears!!!!! The charge seems to last forever and the case is great. I have them paired to my phone and my computer. I have found that sometimes I have to temporarily turn off the blue tooth on my phone in order to have them pick up my computer, but it's as easy as pushing a button and they switch to the computer, hit the button to turn blue tooth back on and they immediately go back to my phone. My husband has a pair that he uses for work and for hands free phone while driving and I plan to get my daughter a pair for Christmas. Love them.

I love these, deducting just one star because mic is just not sensitive enough for my voice, but otherwise for listening they're so good! Just ordered my second pair, I wear them all day every day at work, usually alternating sides but sometimes both when needed to helps me stay sane while working with loud barking dogs. Both earbuds connected easily, sound great and have such good battery life, plus the case charging feature is so handy. I am only replacing after my first set took repeated dives into the dog grooming tub. Understandably sound quality is not so great now. Took apart to clean and dry as well as I could, and they do still play, but very quietly now lol.

I discovered something interesting about these ear buds. If you charge the base, and then place them in their cradle it charges them without having to plug them into a charging source.
They're comfortable to wear, connect quickly to my phone and I love the volume buttons. The best part, I have fallen asleep with them in and didn't have sore ears afterwards. Music is awesome with these and the charge lasts a very long time. So far, I have nothing but 5 stars for these.
The sound is better quality than Beats, I love all the colors I bought two. There’s a digital notification when charge is getting low. Really amazing and better price than name brands.
I love these earbuds! They don't slip out of my ears like others have in the past. The sound quality is amazing. Quick charging with a cute little case.
Se pueden cargar muy fácilmente y claro el %de carga,
La batería dura bastante tiempo....es cómodo y buen sonido....recomendado!!

Ce sont des écouteurs de grande qualité. Le pairage avec mon MP3 est quasi immédiat.
Je recommande ce produit.
very good products I.am Happy
The volume was so low and the sound quality was terrible. Just bought the SoundPeats Wings 2 and it is everything that this one is not.
